92 item_name_t &get_cached_name( item const *it )
93 {
94  auto iter = item_name_cache.find( it );
95  if( iter == item_name_cache.end() ) {
96  return item_name_cache
97  .emplace( it, item_name_t{ remove_color_tags( it->tname( 1, tname::tname_sort_key ) ),
98  remove_color_tags( it->tname( 1, true ) ),
99  it->aggregated_contents().count } )
100  .first->second;
101  }
102 
103  return iter->second;
104 }

113 using parent_path_t = std::vector<item_location>;
114 parent_path_t path_to_top( inventory_entry const &e, inventory_selector_preset const &pr )
115 {
116  item_location it = e.any_item();
117  parent_path_t path{ it };
118  while( it.has_parent() ) {
119  it = it.parent_item();
120  if( pr.is_shown( it ) ) {
121  path.emplace_back( it );
122  }
123  }
124  return path;
125 }

127 using pred_t = std::function<bool( inventory_entry const & )>;
128 void move_if( std::vector<inventory_entry> &src, std::vector<inventory_entry> &dst,
129  pred_t const &pred )
130 {
131  for( auto it = src.begin(); it != src.end(); ) {
132  if( pred( *it ) ) {
133  if( it->is_item() ) {
134  dst.emplace_back( std::move( *it ) );
135  }
136  it = src.erase( it );
137  } else {
138  ++it;
139  }
140  }
141 }

158 bool is_worn_id( item_category_id const &id )

164 item_category const *wielded_worn_category( item_location const &loc, Character const &u )
165 {
166  if( loc == u.get_wielded_item() ) {
167  return &item_category_WEAPON_HELD.obj();
168  }
169  if( u.is_worn( *loc ) || ( loc.has_parent() && is_worn_ablative( loc.parent_item(), loc ) ) ) {
170  if( loc->has_flag( flag_BIONIC_FUEL_SOURCE ) ) {
171  return &item_category_BIONIC_FUEL_SOURCE.obj();
172  }
173  if( loc->has_flag( flag_INTEGRATED ) ) {
174  return &item_category_INTEGRATED.obj();
175  }
176  return &item_category_ITEMS_WORN.obj();
177  }
178  return nullptr;
179 }

183 bool is_worn_ablative( item_location const &container, item_location const &child )
184 {
185  // if the item is in an ablative pocket then put it with the item it is in
186  // first do a short circuit test if the parent has ablative pockets at all
187  return container->is_ablative() && container->is_worn_by_player() &&
188  child.parent_pocket()->get_pocket_data()->ablative;
189 }

230  std::string to_formatted_string( const bool compact = true ) const {
231  std::string string_to_format;
232  if( compact ) {
233  string_to_format = _( "%s/%s : %s/%s : max %s" );
234  } else {
235  string_to_format = _( "(remains %s, %s) max length %s" );
236  }
237  return string_format( string_to_format,
238  unit_to_string( total_capacity - actual_capacity, true, true ),
239  unit_to_string( total_capacity_weight - actual_capacity_weight, true, true ),
240  unit_to_string( max_containable_length, true ) );
241  }

249 class selection_column_preset : public inventory_selector_preset
250 {
251  public:
252  selection_column_preset() = default;
253  std::string get_caption( const inventory_entry &entry ) const override {
254  std::string res;
255  const size_t available_count = entry.get_available_count();
256  const item_location &item = entry.any_item();
257 
258  if( entry.chosen_count > 0 && entry.chosen_count < available_count ) {
259  //~ %1$d: chosen count, %2$d: available count
260  res += string_format( pgettext( "count", "%1$d of %2$d" ), entry.chosen_count,
261  available_count ) + " ";
262  } else if( available_count != 1 ) {
263  res += string_format( "%d ", available_count );
264  }
265  if( item->is_money() ) {
266  cata_assert( available_count == entry.get_stack_size() );
267  if( entry.chosen_count > 0 && entry.chosen_count < available_count ) {
268  res += item->display_money( available_count, item->ammo_remaining(),
269  entry.get_selected_charges() );
270  } else {
271  res += item->display_money( available_count, item->ammo_remaining() );
272  }
273  } else {
274  res += item->display_name( available_count );
275  }
276  return res;
277  }
278 
279  nc_color get_color( const inventory_entry &entry ) const override {
280  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
281  if( entry.is_item() ) {
282  if( entry.any_item() == player_character.get_wielded_item() ) {
283  return c_light_blue;
284  } else if( player_character.is_worn( *entry.any_item() ) ) {
285  return c_cyan;
286  }
287  }
288  return inventory_selector_preset::get_color( entry );
289  }
290 };

412  hit != history.end(); ++hit ) {
413  json.write( *hit );
414  }
415  json.end_array();
416  }
417  json.end_object(); // input_history
418 
419  json.member( "lastreload", lastreload );
420 
421  json.end_object();

439  jo.read( "editmap_nsa_viewmode", editmap_nsa_viewmode );
440  jo.read( "overmap_blinking", overmap_blinking );
441  jo.read( "overmap_show_overlays", overmap_show_overlays );
442  jo.read( "overmap_show_map_notes", overmap_show_map_notes );
443  jo.read( "overmap_show_land_use_codes", overmap_show_land_use_codes );
444  jo.read( "overmap_show_city_labels", overmap_show_city_labels );
445  jo.read( "overmap_show_hordes", overmap_show_hordes );
446  jo.read( "overmap_show_revealed_omts", overmap_show_revealed_omts );
447  jo.read( "overmap_show_forest_trails", overmap_show_forest_trails );
448  jo.read( "hidden_recipes", hidden_recipes );
449  jo.read( "favorite_recipes", favorite_recipes );
450  jo.read( "expanded_recipes", expanded_recipes );
451  jo.read( "read_recipes", read_recipes );
452  jo.read( "recent_recipes", recent_recipes );
453  jo.read( "bionic_ui_sort_mode", bionic_sort_mode );
454  jo.read( "overmap_debug_weather", overmap_debug_weather );
455  jo.read( "overmap_visible_weather", overmap_visible_weather );
456  jo.read( "overmap_debug_mongroup", overmap_debug_mongroup );
457  jo.read( "distraction_noise", distraction_noise );
458  jo.read( "distraction_pain", distraction_pain );
459  jo.read( "distraction_attack", distraction_attack );
460  jo.read( "distraction_hostile_close", distraction_hostile_close );
461  jo.read( "distraction_hostile_spotted", distraction_hostile_spotted );
462  jo.read( "distraction_conversation", distraction_conversation );
463  jo.read( "distraction_asthma", distraction_asthma );
464  jo.read( "distraction_dangerous_field", distraction_dangerous_field );
465  jo.read( "distraction_weather_change", distraction_weather_change );
466  jo.read( "distraction_hunger", distraction_hunger );
467  jo.read( "distraction_thirst", distraction_thirst );
468  jo.read( "distraction_temperature", distraction_temperature );
469  jo.read( "distraction_mutation", distraction_mutation );
470  jo.read( "distraction_oxygen", distraction_oxygen );
471  jo.read( "numpad_navigation", numpad_navigation );
472 
473  if( !jo.read( "vmenu_show_items", vmenu_show_items ) ) {
474  // This is an old save: 1 means view items, 2 means view monsters,
475  // -1 means uninitialized
476  vmenu_show_items = jo.get_int( "list_item_mon", -1 ) != 2;
477  }
478 
479  jo.read( "list_item_sort", list_item_sort );
480  jo.read( "read_items", read_items );
481  jo.read( "list_item_filter_active", list_item_filter_active );
482  jo.read( "list_item_downvote_active", list_item_downvote_active );
483  jo.read( "list_item_priority_active", list_item_priority_active );
484 
485  jo.read( "construction_filter", construction_filter );
486  jo.read( "last_construction", last_construction );
487  jo.read( "construction_tab", construction_tab );
488 
489  for( const JsonMember member : jo.get_object( "input_history" ) ) {
490  std::vector<std::string> &v = gethistory( member.name() );
491  v.clear();
492  for( const std::string line : member.get_array() ) {
493  v.push_back( line );
494  }
495  }
496  // fetch list_item settings from input_history
497  if( !gethistory( "item_filter" ).empty() ) {
498  list_item_filter = gethistory( "item_filter" ).back();
499  }
500  if( !gethistory( "list_item_downvote" ).empty() ) {
501  list_item_downvote = gethistory( "list_item_downvote" ).back();
502  }
503  if( !gethistory( "list_item_priority" ).empty() ) {
504  list_item_priority = gethistory( "list_item_priority" ).back();
505  }
506 
507  jo.read( "lastreload", lastreload );
508 }

512 bool inventory_entry::is_hidden( std::optional<bool> const &hide_entries_override ) const
513 {
514  if( !is_item() ) {
515  return false;
516  }
517 
518  if( is_collation_entry() && collation_meta->collapsed ) {
519  return true;
520  }
521 
522  if( !topmost_parent ) {
523  return false;
524  }
525 
526  item_location item = locations.front();
527  if( hide_entries_override && topmost_parent && topmost_parent->is_container() ) {
528  return *hide_entries_override;
529  }
530  while( item.has_parent() && item != topmost_parent ) {
531  if( item.parent_pocket()->settings.is_collapsed() ) {
532  return true;
533  }
534  item = item.parent_item();
535  }
536  return false;
537 }
538 
539 int inventory_entry::get_total_charges() const
540 {
541  int result = 0;
542  for( const item_location &location : locations ) {
543  result += location->charges;
544  }
545  return result;
546 }
547 
548 int inventory_entry::get_selected_charges() const
549 {
550  cata_assert( chosen_count <= locations.size() );
551  int result = 0;
552  for( size_t i = 0; i < chosen_count; ++i ) {
553  const item_location &location = locations[i];
554  result += location->charges;
555  }
556  return result;
557 }

559 size_t inventory_entry::get_available_count() const
560 {
561  if( locations.size() == 1 ) {
562  return any_item()->count();
563  } else {
564  return locations.size();
565  }
566 }

568 int inventory_entry::get_invlet() const
569 {
570  if( custom_invlet != INT_MIN ) {
571  return custom_invlet;
572  }
573  if( !is_item() ) {
574  return '\0';
575  }
576  return any_item()->invlet;
577 }

712 
713 std::string inventory_selector_preset::get_caption( const inventory_entry &entry ) const
714 {
715  size_t count = entry.get_stack_size();
716  std::string disp_name;
717  if( entry.any_item()->is_money() ) {
718  disp_name = entry.any_item()->display_money( count, entry.any_item()->ammo_remaining() );
719  } else if( entry.is_collation_header() && entry.any_item()->count_by_charges() ) {
720  item temp( *entry.any_item() );
721  temp.charges = entry.get_total_charges();
722  disp_name = temp.display_name();
723  count = 1;
724  } else {
725  disp_name = entry.any_item()->display_name( count );
726  }
727 
728  return ( count > 1 ) ? string_format( "%d %s", count, disp_name ) : disp_name;
729 }

731 std::string inventory_selector_preset::get_denial( const inventory_entry &entry ) const
732 {

734 }
735 
736 std::string inventory_selector_preset::get_cell_text( const inventory_entry &entry,
737  size_t cell_index ) const
738 {
739  if( cell_index >= cells.size() ) {
740  debugmsg( "Invalid cell index %d.", cell_index );
741  return "it's a bug!";
742  }
743  if( !entry ) {
744  return std::string();
745  } else if( entry.is_item() ) {
746  std::string text = cells[cell_index].get_text( entry );
747  const item &actual_item = *entry.locations.front();
748  const std::string info_display = get_option<std::string>( "DETAILED_CONTAINERS" );
749  // if we want no additional info skip this
750  if( info_display != "NONE" ) {
751  // if we want additional info for all items or it is worn then add the additional info
752  if( info_display == "ALL" || ( info_display == "WORN" &&
753  is_worn_id( entry.get_category_ptr()->get_id() ) &&
754  actual_item.is_worn_by_player() ) ) {
755  if( cell_index == 0 && !text.empty() &&
756  actual_item.is_container() && actual_item.has_unrestricted_pockets() ) {
757  const units::volume total_capacity = actual_item.get_total_capacity( true );
758  const units::mass total_capacity_weight = actual_item.get_total_weight_capacity( true );
759  const units::length max_containable_length = actual_item.max_containable_length( true );
760 
761  const units::volume actual_capacity = actual_item.get_total_contained_volume( true );
762  const units::mass actual_capacity_weight = actual_item.get_total_contained_weight( true );
763 
764  container_data container_data = {
765  actual_capacity,
766  total_capacity,
767  actual_capacity_weight,
768  total_capacity_weight,
769  max_containable_length
770  };
771  std::string formatted_string = container_data.to_formatted_string( false );
772 
773  text = text + string_format( " %s", formatted_string );
774  }
775  }
776  }
777  return text;
778  } else if( cell_index != 0 ) {
779  return replace_colors( cells[cell_index].title );
780  } else {
781  return entry.get_category_ptr()->name_header();
782  }
783 }
784 
785 bool inventory_selector_preset::is_stub_cell( const inventory_entry &entry,
786  size_t cell_index ) const
787 {
788  if( !entry.is_item() ) {
789  return false;
790  }
791  const std::string &text = entry.get_entry_cell_cache( *this ).text[ cell_index ];
792  return text.empty() || text == cells[cell_index].stub;
793 }
794 
795 void inventory_selector_preset::append_cell( const
796  std::function<std::string( const item_location & )> &func,
797  const std::string &title, const std::string &stub )
798 {
799  // Don't capture by reference here. The func should be able to die earlier than the object itself
800  append_cell( std::function<std::string( const inventory_entry & )>( [ func ](
801  const inventory_entry & entry ) {
802  return func( entry.any_item() );
803  } ), title, stub );
804 }
805 
806 void inventory_selector_preset::append_cell( const
807  std::function<std::string( const inventory_entry & )> &func,
808  const std::string &title, const std::string &stub )
809 {
810  const auto iter = std::find_if( cells.begin(), cells.end(), [ &title ]( const cell_t &cell ) {
811  return cell.title == title;
812  } );
813  if( iter != cells.end() ) {
814  debugmsg( "Tried to append a duplicate cell \"%s\": ignored.", title.c_str() );
815  return;
816  }
817  cells.emplace_back( func, title, stub );
818 }
819 
820 std::string inventory_selector_preset::cell_t::get_text( const inventory_entry &entry ) const
821 {
822  return replace_colors( func( entry ) );
823 }
824 
825 const item_location &inventory_holster_preset::get_holster() const
826 {
827  return holster;
828 }
829 
830 bool inventory_holster_preset::is_shown( const item_location &contained ) const
831 {
832  if( contained == holster ) {
833  return false;
834  }
835  if( contained.eventually_contains( holster ) || holster.eventually_contains( contained ) ) {
836  return false;
837  }
838  if( !is_container( contained ) && contained->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) &&
839  !contained->is_frozen_liquid() ) {
840  // spilt liquid cannot be picked up
841  return false;
842  }
843  //only hide if it is in the toplevel of holster (to allow shuffling of items inside a bag)
844  for( const item *it : holster->all_items_top() ) {
845  if( it == contained.get_item() ) {
846  return false;
847  }
848  }
849 
850  return true;
851 }
852 
853 std::string inventory_holster_preset::get_denial( const item_location &it ) const
854 {
855  if( who->is_worn( *it ) ) {
856  ret_val<void> const ret = who->can_takeoff( *it );
857  if( !ret.success() ) {
858  return ret.str();
859  }
860  }
861 
862  if( it->is_bucket_nonempty() ) {
863  return "item would spill";
864  }
865 
866  item item_copy( *it );
867  item_copy.charges = 1;
868  item_location parent = it.has_parent() ? it.parent_item() : item_location();
869 
870  ret_val<void> ret = holster->can_contain( item_copy, false, false, true, false, parent );
871  if( !ret.success() ) {
872  return !ret.str().empty() ? ret.str() : "item can't be stored there";
873  }
874 
875  ret = holster.parents_can_contain_recursive( &item_copy );
876  if( !ret.success() ) {
877  return !ret.str().empty() ? ret.str() : "item can't be stored there";
878  }
879 
880  return {};
881 }
882 
883 void inventory_column::highlight( size_t new_index, scroll_direction dir )
884 {
885  if( new_index < entries.size() ) {
886  if( !entries[new_index].is_highlightable( skip_unselectable ) ) {
887  new_index = next_highlightable_index( new_index, dir );
888  }
889 
890  highlighted_index = new_index;
891  page_offset = ( new_index == static_cast<size_t>( -1 ) ) ?
892  0 : highlighted_index - highlighted_index % entries_per_page;
893  }
894 }
895 
896 size_t inventory_column::next_highlightable_index( size_t index, scroll_direction dir ) const
897 {
898  if( entries.empty() ) {
899  return index;
900  }
901  // limit index to the space of the size of entries
902  index = index % entries.size();
903  size_t new_index = index;
904  do {
905  // 'new_index' incremented by 'dir' using division remainder (number of entries) to loop over the entries.
906  // Negative step '-k' (backwards) is equivalent to '-k + N' (forward), where:
907  // N = entries.size() - number of elements,
908  // k = |step| - absolute step (k <= N).
909  new_index = ( new_index + static_cast<int>( dir ) + entries.size() ) % entries.size();
910  } while( new_index != index &&
911  !entries[new_index].is_highlightable( skip_unselectable ) );
912 
913  if( !entries[new_index].is_highlightable( skip_unselectable ) ) {
914  return static_cast<size_t>( -1 );
915  }
916 
917  return new_index;
918 }
919 
920 void inventory_column::move_selection( scroll_direction dir )
921 {
922  size_t index = highlighted_index;
923 
924  do {
925  index = next_highlightable_index( index, dir );
926  } while( index != highlighted_index && is_selected_by_category( entries[index] ) );
927 
928  highlight( index, dir );
929 }
930 
931 void inventory_column::move_selection_page( scroll_direction dir )
932 {
933  size_t index = highlighted_index;
934 
935  do {
936  const size_t next_index = next_highlightable_index( index, dir );
937  const bool flipped = next_index == highlighted_index ||
938  ( next_index > highlighted_index ) != ( static_cast<int>( dir ) > 0 );
939 
940  if( flipped && page_of( next_index ) == page_index() ) {
941  break; // If flipped and still on the same page - no need to flip
942  }
943 
944  index = next_index;
945  } while( page_of( next_highlightable_index( index, dir ) ) == page_index() );
946 
947  highlight( index, dir );
948 }
949 
950 void inventory_column::scroll_selection_page( scroll_direction dir )
951 {
952  size_t index = highlighted_index;
953 
954  while( page_of( index = next_highlightable_index( index, dir ) ) == page_index() ) {
955 
956  if( index == highlighted_index && page_of( index ) == page_index() ) {
957  break; // If flipped and still on the same page - no need to flip
958  }
959  }
960 
961  highlight( index, dir );
962 }
963 
964 size_t inventory_column::get_entry_cell_width( const inventory_entry &entry,
965  size_t cell_index ) const
966 {
967  size_t res = utf8_width( entry.get_entry_cell_cache( preset ).text[cell_index], true );
968 
969  if( cell_index == 0 ) {
970  res += get_entry_indent( entry );
971  }
972 
973  return res;
974 }
975 
976 size_t inventory_column::get_cells_width() const

979  const cell_t &cell ) {
980  return lhs + cell.current_width;
981  } );
982 }

994 
995 void inventory_entry::make_entry_cell_cache(
996  inventory_selector_preset const &preset, bool update_only ) const
997 {
998  if( update_only && !entry_cell_cache ) {
999  return;
1000  }
1001  entry_cell_cache.emplace( entry_cell_cache_t{
1002  preset.get_color( *this ),
1003  { preset.get_cells_count(), std::string() } } );
1004 
1005  for( size_t i = 0, n = preset.get_cells_count(); i < n; ++i ) {
1006  entry_cell_cache->text[i] = preset.get_cell_text( *this, i );
1007  }
1008 }
1009 
1010 void inventory_entry::reset_entry_cell_cache() const
1011 {
1012  entry_cell_cache.reset();
1013 }
1014 
1015 const inventory_entry::entry_cell_cache_t &inventory_entry::get_entry_cell_cache(
1016  inventory_selector_preset const &preset ) const
1017 {
1018  //lang check here is needed to rebuild cache when using "Toggle language to English" option
1019  if( !entry_cell_cache ||
1020  entry_cell_cache->lang_version != detail::get_current_language_version() ) {
1021  make_entry_cell_cache( preset, false );
1022  cache_denial( preset );
1023  cata_assert( entry_cell_cache.has_value() );
1024  entry_cell_cache->lang_version = detail::get_current_language_version();
1025  }
1026 
1027  return *entry_cell_cache;
1028 }
1029 
1030 void inventory_column::set_width( const size_t new_width )
1031 {
1032  int width_gap = get_width() - new_width;
1033  // Now adjust the width if we must
1034  while( width_gap != 0 ) {
1035  const int step = width_gap > 0 ? -1 : 1;
1036  // Should return true when lhs < rhs
1037  const auto cmp_for_expansion = []( const cell_t &lhs, const cell_t &rhs ) {
1038  return lhs.visible() && lhs.gap() < rhs.gap();
1039  };
1040  // Should return true when lhs < rhs
1041  const auto cmp_for_shrinking = []( const cell_t &lhs, const cell_t &rhs ) {
1042  if( !lhs.visible() ) {
1043  return false;
1044  }
1045  if( rhs.gap() <= min_cell_gap ) {
1046  return lhs.current_width < rhs.current_width;
1047  } else {
1048  return lhs.gap() < rhs.gap();
1049  }
1050  };
1051  const auto &cell = step > 0
1052  ? std::min_element( cells.begin(), cells.end(), cmp_for_expansion )
1053  : std::max_element( cells.begin(), cells.end(), cmp_for_shrinking );
1054 
1055  if( cell == cells.end() || !cell->visible() ) {
1056  break; // This is highly unlikely to happen, but just in case
1057  }
1058  cell->current_width += step;
1059  width_gap += step;
1060  }
1061  reserved_width = new_width;
1062 }
1063 
1064 void inventory_column::set_height( size_t new_height )
1065 {
1066  if( height != new_height ) {
1067  if( new_height <= 1 ) {
1068  debugmsg( "Unable to assign height <= 1 (was %zd).", new_height );
1069  return;
1070  }
1071  height = new_height;
1072  entries_per_page = new_height;
1073  paging_is_valid = false;
1074  }
1075 }
1076 
1077 void inventory_column::expand_to_fit( inventory_entry &entry, bool with_denial )
1078 {
1079  if( !entry ) {
1080  return;
1081  }
1082 
1083  entry.cache_denial( preset );
1084  cata_assert( entry.denial.has_value() );
1085  const std::string &denial = *entry.denial;
1086 
1087  for( size_t i = 0, num = with_denial && denial.empty() ? cells.size() : 1; i < num; ++i ) {
1088  auto &cell = cells[i];
1089 
1090  cell.real_width = std::max( cell.real_width, get_entry_cell_width( entry, i ) );
1091 
1092  // Don't reveal the cell for headers and stubs
1093  if( cell.visible() || ( entry.is_item() && !preset.is_stub_cell( entry, i ) ) ) {
1094  const size_t cell_gap = i > 0 ? normal_cell_gap : 0;
1095  cell.current_width = std::max( cell.current_width, cell_gap + cell.real_width );
1096  }
1097  }
1098 
1099  if( with_denial && !denial.empty() ) {
1100  reserved_width = std::max( get_entry_cell_width( entry, 0 ) + min_denial_gap + utf8_width( denial,
1101  true ),
1102  reserved_width );
1103  }
1104 }
1105 
1106 void inventory_column::reset_width( const std::vector<inventory_column *> & )
1107 {
1108  for( inventory_column::cell_t &elem : cells ) {
1109  elem = cell_t();
1110  }
1111  reserved_width = 0;
1112  for( inventory_entry &elem : entries ) {
1113  expand_to_fit( elem );
1114  }
1115 }
1116 
1117 size_t inventory_column::page_of( size_t index ) const
1118 {
1119  cata_assert( entries_per_page ); // To appease static analysis
1120  // NOLINTNEXTLINE(clang-analyzer-core.DivideZero)
1121  return index / entries_per_page;
1122 }

1124 size_t inventory_column::page_of( const inventory_entry &entry ) const
1125 {

1127  entry ) ) );
1128 }

1181 void inventory_column::_get_entries( get_entries_t *res, entries_t const &ent,
1182  const ffilter_t &filter_func ) const
1183 {

1188  }

1193 inventory_column::get_entries_t inventory_column::get_entries( const ffilter_t &filter_func,
1194  bool include_hidden ) const
1195 {
1196  get_entries_t res;
1197 
1198  if( allows_selecting() ) {
1199  _get_entries( &res, entries, filter_func );
1200  if( include_hidden ) {
1201  _get_entries( &res, entries_hidden, filter_func );
1202  }
1203  }
1204 
1205  return res;
1206 }
1207 
1208 void inventory_column::set_stack_favorite( inventory_entry &entry,
1209  const bool favorite )
1210 {
1211  for( item_location &loc : entry.locations ) {
1212  loc->set_favorite( favorite );
1213  }
1214  entry.make_entry_cell_cache( preset );
1215 }
1216 
1217 void inventory_column::set_collapsed( inventory_entry &entry, const bool collapse )
1218 {
1219  bool collapsed = false;
1220  if( entry.is_collation_header() ) {
1221  entry.collation_meta->collapsed = collapse;
1222  collapsed = true;
1223  } else {
1224  std::vector<item_location> &locations = entry.locations;
1225 
1226  for( item_location &loc : locations ) {
1227  for( item_pocket *pocket : loc->get_all_standard_pockets() ) {
1228  pocket->settings.set_collapse( collapse );
1229  collapsed = true;
1230  }
1231  }
1232  }
1233 
1234  if( collapsed ) {
1235  entry.collapsed = collapse;
1236  paging_is_valid = false;
1237  entry.make_entry_cell_cache( preset );
1238  }
1239 }
1240 
1241 void inventory_column::on_input( const inventory_input &input )
1242 {
1243  if( !empty() && active ) {
1244  if( input.action == "DOWN" ) {
1245  move_selection( scroll_direction::FORWARD );
1246  } else if( input.action == "UP" ) {
1247  move_selection( scroll_direction::BACKWARD );
1248  } else if( input.action == "PAGE_DOWN" ) {
1249  move_selection_page( scroll_direction::FORWARD );
1250  } else if( input.action == "PAGE_UP" ) {
1251  move_selection_page( scroll_direction::BACKWARD );
1252  } else if( input.action == "SCROLL_DOWN" ) {
1253  scroll_selection_page( scroll_direction::FORWARD );
1254  } else if( input.action == "SCROLL_UP" ) {
1255  scroll_selection_page( scroll_direction::BACKWARD );
1256  } else if( input.action == "HOME" ) {
1257  highlight( 0, scroll_direction::FORWARD );
1258  } else if( input.action == "END" ) {
1259  highlight( entries.size() - 1, scroll_direction::BACKWARD );
1260  } else if( input.action == "TOGGLE_FAVORITE" ) {
1261  inventory_entry &selected = get_highlighted();
1262  set_stack_favorite( selected, !selected.any_item()->is_favorite );
1263  } else if( input.action == "SHOW_HIDE_CONTENTS" ) {
1264  inventory_entry &selected = get_highlighted();
1265  selected.collapsed ? set_collapsed( selected, false ) : set_collapsed( selected, true );
1266  }
1267  }
1268 
1269  if( input.action == "TOGGLE_FAVORITE" ) {
1270  // Favoriting items in one column may change item names in another column
1271  // if that column contains an item that contains the favorited item. So
1272  // we invalidate every column on TOGGLE_FAVORITE action.
1273  paging_is_valid = false;
1274  }
1275 }

1277 void inventory_column::on_change( const inventory_entry &/* entry */ )
1278 {
1279  // stub
1280 }
1281 
1282 inventory_entry *inventory_column::add_entry( const inventory_entry &entry )
1283 {
1284  entries_t &dest = entry.is_hidden( hide_entries_override ) ? entries_hidden : entries;
1285  if( auto it = std::find( dest.begin(), dest.end(), entry ); it != dest.end() ) {
1286  debugmsg( "Tried to add a duplicate entry." );
1287  return &*it;
1288  }
1289  paging_is_valid = false;
1290  if( entry.is_item() ) {
1291  item_location entry_item = entry.locations.front();
1292 
1293  auto entry_with_loc = std::find_if( dest.begin(),
1294  dest.end(), [&entry, &entry_item, this]( const inventory_entry & e ) {
1295  if( !e.is_item() ) {
1296  return false;
1297  }
1298  item_location found_entry_item = e.locations.front();
1299  return !e.is_collated() &&
1300  e.get_category_ptr() == entry.get_category_ptr() &&
1301  entry_item.where() == found_entry_item.where() &&
1302  entry_item.position() == found_entry_item.position() &&
1303  entry_item.parent_item() == found_entry_item.parent_item() &&
1304  entry_item->is_collapsed() == found_entry_item->is_collapsed() &&
1305  entry_item->link_length() == found_entry_item->link_length() &&
1306  entry_item->max_link_length() == found_entry_item->max_link_length() &&
1307  entry_item->display_stacked_with( *found_entry_item, preset.get_checking_components() );
1308  } );
1309  if( entry_with_loc != dest.end() ) {
1310  std::vector<item_location> &locations = entry_with_loc->locations;
1311  std::move( entry.locations.begin(), entry.locations.end(), std::back_inserter( locations ) );
1312  return &*entry_with_loc;
1313  }
1314  }
1315 
1316  dest.emplace_back( entry );
1317  inventory_entry &newent = dest.back();
1318  newent.update_cache();
1319 
1320  return &newent;
1321 }
1322 
1323 void inventory_column::move_entries_to( inventory_column &dest )
1324 {
1325  std::move( entries.begin(), entries.end(), std::back_inserter( dest.entries ) );
1326  std::move( entries_hidden.begin(), entries_hidden.end(),
1327  std::back_inserter( dest.entries_hidden ) );
1328  dest.paging_is_valid = false;
1329  clear();
1330 }
1331 
1332 bool inventory_column::sort_compare( inventory_entry const &lhs, inventory_entry const &rhs )
1333 {
1334  if( lhs.is_selectable() != rhs.is_selectable() ) {
1335  return lhs.is_selectable(); // Disabled items always go last
1336  }
1337  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
1338  // Place favorite items and items with an assigned inventory letter first,
1339  // since the player cared enough to assign them
1340  const bool left_has_invlet =
1341  player_character.inv->assigned_invlet.count( lhs.any_item()->invlet ) != 0;
1342  const bool right_has_invlet =
1343  player_character.inv->assigned_invlet.count( rhs.any_item()->invlet ) != 0;
1344  if( left_has_invlet != right_has_invlet ) {
1345  return left_has_invlet;
1346  }
1347  const bool left_fav = lhs.any_item()->is_favorite;
1348  const bool right_fav = rhs.any_item()->is_favorite;
1349  if( left_fav != right_fav ) {
1350  return left_fav;
1351  }
1352 
1353  return preset.sort_compare( lhs, rhs );
1354 }
1355 
1356 bool inventory_column::indented_sort_compare( inventory_entry const &lhs,
1357  inventory_entry const &rhs )
1358 {
1359  // place children below all parents
1360  parent_path_t const path_lhs = path_to_top( lhs, preset );
1361  parent_path_t const path_rhs = path_to_top( rhs, preset );
1362  parent_path_t::size_type const common_depth = std::min( path_lhs.size(), path_rhs.size() );
1363  parent_path_t::size_type li = path_lhs.size() - common_depth;
1364  parent_path_t::size_type ri = path_rhs.size() - common_depth;
1365  item_location p_lhs = path_lhs[li];
1366  item_location p_rhs = path_rhs[ri];
1367  if( p_lhs == p_rhs ) {
1368  return path_lhs.size() < path_rhs.size();
1369  }
1370  // otherwise sort the entries below their lowest common ancestor
1371  while( li < path_lhs.size() && path_lhs[li] != path_rhs[ri] ) {
1372  p_lhs = path_lhs[li++];
1373  p_rhs = path_rhs[ri++];
1374  }
1375 
1376  inventory_entry ep_lhs( { p_lhs }, nullptr, true, 0, lhs.generation );
1377  inventory_entry ep_rhs( { p_rhs }, nullptr, true, 0, rhs.generation );
1378  ep_lhs.update_cache();
1379  ep_rhs.update_cache();
1380  return sort_compare( ep_lhs, ep_rhs );
1381 }
1382 
1383 bool inventory_column::collated_sort_compare( inventory_entry const &lhs,
1384  inventory_entry const &rhs )
1385 {
1386  if( lhs.is_collated() && lhs.collation_meta == rhs.collation_meta ) {
1387  if( lhs.is_collation_header() ) {
1388  return true;
1389  }
1390  if( rhs.is_collation_header() ) {
1391  return false;
1392  }
1393  return sort_compare( lhs, rhs );
1394  }
1395 
1396  item_location p_lhs = lhs.is_collated() ? lhs.collation_meta->tip : lhs.any_item();
1397  item_location p_rhs = rhs.is_collated() ? rhs.collation_meta->tip : rhs.any_item();
1398 
1399  inventory_entry ep_lhs(
1400  { p_lhs }, nullptr, lhs.is_collated() ? lhs.collation_meta->enabled : lhs.is_selectable(),
1401  0, lhs.generation );
1402  inventory_entry ep_rhs(
1403  { p_rhs }, nullptr, rhs.is_collated() ? rhs.collation_meta->enabled : rhs.is_selectable(),
1404  0, rhs.generation );
1405  ep_lhs.update_cache();
1406  ep_rhs.update_cache();
1407  if( indent_entries() ) {
1408  return indented_sort_compare( ep_lhs, ep_rhs );
1409  }
1410  return sort_compare( ep_lhs, ep_rhs );
1411 }
1412 
1413 void inventory_column::collate()
1414 {
1415  for( auto outer = entries.begin(); outer != entries.end(); ++outer ) {
1416  if( !outer->is_item() || outer->is_collated() || outer->chevron ) {
1417  continue;
1418  }
1419  for( auto e = std::next( outer ); e != entries.end(); ) {
1420  if( e->is_item() && e->get_category_ptr() == outer->get_category_ptr() &&
1421  e->any_item()->is_favorite == outer->any_item()->is_favorite &&
1422  e->any_item()->typeId() == outer->any_item()->typeId() &&
1423  std::min( 0, e->any_item()->link_length() ) == std::min( 0, outer->any_item()->link_length() ) &&
1424  e->any_item()->max_link_length() == outer->any_item()->max_link_length() &&
1425  ( !indent_entries() ||
1426  e->any_item().parent_item() == outer->any_item().parent_item() ) &&
1427  ( e->is_collation_header() || !e->chevron ) &&
1428  e->any_item()->is_same_relic( *outer->any_item() ) ) {
1429 
1430  if( !outer->is_collated() ) {
1431  outer->collation_meta = std::make_shared<collation_meta_t>(
1432  collation_meta_t{ outer->any_item(), true, outer->is_selectable() } );
1433 
1434  entries_hidden.emplace_back( *outer );
1435 
1436  outer->chevron = true;
1437  set_collapsed( *outer, true );
1438  outer->reset_entry_cell_cache(); // needed when switching UI modes
1439  }
1440  e->collation_meta = outer->collation_meta;
1441  std::copy( e->locations.begin(), e->locations.end(),
1442  std::back_inserter( outer->locations ) );
1443  entries_hidden.emplace_back( std::move( *e ) );
1444  e = entries.erase( e );
1445  } else {
1446  ++e;
1447  }
1448  }
1449  }
1450  _collated = true;
1451 }
1452 
1453 void inventory_column::_reset_collation( entries_t &entries )
1454 {
1455  for( auto iter = entries.begin(); iter != entries.end(); ) {
1456  if( iter->is_collation_header() ) {
1457  iter = entries.erase( iter );
1458  } else {
1459  iter->reset_collation();
1460  ++iter;
1461  }
1462  }
1463 }
1464 
1465 void inventory_column::uncollate()
1466 {
1467  if( _collated ) {
1468  _reset_collation( entries );
1469  _reset_collation( entries_hidden );
1470  _collated = false;
1471  }
1472 }
1473 
1474 void inventory_column::prepare_paging( const std::string &filter )
1475 {
1476  if( paging_is_valid ) {
1477  return;
1478  }
1479 
1480  const auto filter_fn = filter_from_string<inventory_entry>(
1481  filter, [this]( const std::string & filter ) {
1482  return preset.get_filter( filter );
1483  } );
1484 
1485  const auto is_visible = [&filter_fn, &filter, this]( inventory_entry const & it ) {
1486  return it.is_item() &&
1487  ( filter_fn( it ) &&
1488  ( ( !filter.empty() && !it.is_collation_entry() ) || !it.is_hidden( hide_entries_override ) ) );
1489  };
1490  const auto is_not_visible = [&is_visible, this]( inventory_entry const & it ) {
1491  it.cache_denial( preset ); // do it here since we're looping over all visible entries anyway
1492  return !is_visible( it );
1493  };
1494 
1495  // restore entries revealed by SHOW_HIDE_CONTENTS or filter
1496  move_if( entries_hidden, entries, is_visible );
1497  // remove entries hidden by SHOW_HIDE_CONTENTS
1498  move_if( entries, entries_hidden, is_not_visible );
1499 
1500  // Then sort them with respect to categories
1501  std::stable_sort( entries.begin(), entries.end(),
1502  [this]( const inventory_entry & lhs, const inventory_entry & rhs ) {
1503  if( *lhs.get_category_ptr() == *rhs.get_category_ptr() ) {
1504  if( _collated ) {
1505  return collated_sort_compare( lhs, rhs );
1506  }
1507  if( indent_entries() ) {
1508  return indented_sort_compare( lhs, rhs );
1509  }
1510 
1511  return sort_compare( lhs, rhs );
1512  }
1513  return preset.cat_sort_compare( lhs, rhs );
1514  } );
1515 
1516  if( !_collated && collate_entries() ) {
1517  collate();
1518  }
1519 
1520  // Recover categories
1521  const item_category *current_category = nullptr;
1522  for( auto iter = entries.begin(); iter != entries.end(); ++iter ) {
1523  if( iter->get_category_ptr() == current_category ) {
1524  continue;
1525  }
1526  current_category = iter->get_category_ptr();
1527  iter = entries.insert( iter, inventory_entry( current_category ) );
1528  }
1529  // Determine the new height.
1530  entries_per_page = height;
1531  if( entries.size() > entries_per_page ) {
1532  entries_per_page -= 1; // Make room for the page number.
1533  for( size_t i = entries_per_page - 1; i < entries.size(); i += entries_per_page ) {
1534  auto iter = std::next( entries.begin(), i );
1535  if( iter->is_category() ) {
1536  // The last item on the page must not be a category.
1537  entries.insert( iter, inventory_entry() );
1538  } else {
1539  // The first item on the next page must be a category.
1540  iter = std::next( iter );
1541  if( iter != entries.end() && iter->is_item() ) {
1542  entries.insert( iter, inventory_entry( iter->get_category_ptr() ) );
1543  }
1544  }
1545  }
1546  }
1547  paging_is_valid = true;
1548  // Select the uppermost possible entry
1549  const size_t ind = highlighted_index >= entries.size() ? 0 : highlighted_index;
1550  highlight( ind, ind ? scroll_direction::BACKWARD : scroll_direction::FORWARD );
1551 }
1552 
1553 void inventory_column::clear()
1554 {
1555  entries.clear();
1556  entries_hidden.clear();
1557  paging_is_valid = false;
1558 }
1559 
1560 bool inventory_column::highlight( const item_location &loc, bool front_only )
1561 {
1562  for( size_t index = 0; index < entries.size(); ++index ) {
1563  inventory_entry &ent = entries[index];
1564  if( ent.is_item() &&
1565  ( ( !front_only && std::find( ent.locations.begin(), ent.locations.end(), loc ) !=
1566  ent.locations.end() ) ||
1567  ( !ent.is_collation_header() && ent.locations.front() == loc ) ) ) {
1568  highlight( index, scroll_direction::FORWARD );
1569  return true;
1570  }
1571  }
1572  return false;
1573 }
1574 
1575 size_t inventory_column::get_entry_indent( const inventory_entry &entry ) const
1576 {
1577  if( !entry.is_item() ) {
1578  return 0;
1579  }
1580 
1581  size_t res = 2;
1582  if( get_option<bool>( "ITEM_SYMBOLS" ) ) {
1583  res += 2;
1584  }
1585  if( allows_selecting() && activatable() && multiselect ) {
1586  res += 2;
1587  }
1588  if( entry.is_item() ) {
1589  if( collate_entries() && entry.is_collation_entry() ) {
1590  res += 2;
1591  }
1592  if( indent_entries() ) {
1593  res += entry.indent;
1594  }
1595  }
1596 
1597  return res;
1598 }
1599 
1600 int inventory_column::reassign_custom_invlets( const Character &p, int min_invlet, int max_invlet )
1601 {
1602  int cur_invlet = min_invlet;
1603  for( inventory_entry &elem : entries ) {
1604  // Only items on map/in vehicles: those that the player does not possess.
1605  if( elem.is_selectable() && !p.has_item( *elem.any_item() ) ) {
1606  elem.custom_invlet = cur_invlet <= max_invlet ? cur_invlet++ : '\0';
1607  }
1608  }
1609  return cur_invlet;
1610 }
1611 
1612 int inventory_column::reassign_custom_invlets( int cur_idx, const std::string_view pickup_chars )
1613 {
1614  for( inventory_entry &elem : entries ) {
1615  // Only items on map/in vehicles: those that the player does not possess.
1616  if( elem.is_selectable() && elem.any_item()->invlet <= '\0' ) {
1617  elem.custom_invlet =
1618  static_cast<uint8_t>(
1619  cur_idx < static_cast<int>( pickup_chars.size() ) ?
1620  pickup_chars[cur_idx] : '\0'
1621  );
1622  cur_idx++;
1623  }
1624  }
1625  return cur_idx;
1626 }
1627 
1628 void inventory_column::draw( const catacurses::window &win, const point &p,
1629  std::vector<std::pair<inclusive_rectangle<point>, inventory_entry *>> &rect_entry_map )
1630 {
1631  if( !visible() ) {
1632  return;
1633  }
1634  const auto available_cell_width = [ this ]( inventory_entry const & entry, size_t cell_index ) {
1635  const size_t displayed_width = cells[cell_index].current_width;
1636  const size_t real_width = get_entry_cell_width( entry, cell_index );
1637 
1638  return displayed_width > real_width ? displayed_width - real_width : 0;
1639  };
1640 
1641  // Do the actual drawing
1642  for( size_t index = page_offset, line = 0; index < entries.size() &&
1643  line < entries_per_page; ++index, ++line ) {
1644  inventory_entry &entry = entries[index];
1645 
1646  if( !entry ) {
1647  continue;
1648  }
1649  const inventory_entry::entry_cell_cache_t &entry_cell_cache = entry.get_entry_cell_cache( preset );
1650 
1651  int x1 = p.x + get_entry_indent( entry );
1652  int x2 = p.x + std::max( static_cast<int>( reserved_width - get_cells_width() ), 0 );
1653  int yy = p.y + line;
1654 
1655  const bool selected = active && is_highlighted( entry );
1656 
1657  const int hx_max = p.x + get_width();
1658  inclusive_rectangle<point> rect = inclusive_rectangle<point>( point( x1, yy ),
1659  point( hx_max - 1, yy ) );
1660  rect_entry_map.emplace_back( rect,
1661  &entry );
1662 
1663  if( selected && visible_cells() > 1 ) {
1664  for( int hx = x1; hx < hx_max; ++hx ) {
1665  mvwputch( win, point( hx, yy ), h_white, ' ' );
1666  }
1667  }
1668 
1669  cata_assert( entry.denial.has_value() );
1670  const std::string &denial = *entry.denial;
1671 
1672  if( !denial.empty() ) {
1673  // Determine the width available for the first cell to print, then use that to trim the denial
1674  const size_t first_cell_width = std::min( get_entry_cell_width( entry, 0 ),
1675  x2 + cells[0].current_width - min_denial_gap );
1676  const size_t max_denial_width = std::max( static_cast<int>( get_width() - ( min_denial_gap +
1677  first_cell_width ) ), 0 );
1678  const size_t denial_width = std::min( max_denial_width, static_cast<size_t>( utf8_width( denial,
1679  true ) ) );
1680 
1681  if( denial_width > 0 ) {
1682  /* Need to determine exact point to start printing from the left, since just trimming produces
1683  * artifacts on languages with wide characters, and right_print expects only a second column */
1684  std::string trimmed = trim_by_length( denial, denial_width );
1685  const int x = p.x + get_width() - utf8_width( remove_color_tags( trimmed ) );
1686  nc_color temp = c_red;
1687  print_colored_text( win, point( x, yy ), temp, c_red,
1688  selected ? hilite_string( colorize( trimmed, c_red ) ) : trimmed );
1689  entry.cached_denial_space = denial_width;
1690  }
1691  }
1692 
1693  size_t count = denial.empty() ? cells.size() : 1;
1694 
1695  for( size_t cell_index = 0; cell_index < count; ++cell_index ) {
1696  if( !cells[cell_index].visible() ) {
1697  continue; // Don't show empty cells
1698  }
1699 
1700  if( line != 0 && cell_index != 0 && entry.is_category() ) {
1701  break; // Don't show duplicated titles
1702  }
1703 
1704  x2 += cells[cell_index].current_width;
1705  std::string text = entry_cell_cache.text[cell_index];
1706 
1707  size_t text_width = utf8_width( text, true );
1708  size_t text_gap = cell_index > 0 ? std::max( cells[cell_index].gap(), min_cell_gap ) : 0;
1709  size_t available_width = x2 - x1 - text_gap;
1710 
1711  if( text_width > available_width ) {
1712  // See if we can steal some of the needed width from an adjacent cell
1713  if( cell_index == 0 && count >= 2 ) {
1714  available_width += available_cell_width( entry, 1 );
1715  } else if( cell_index > 0 ) {
1716  available_width += available_cell_width( entry, cell_index - 1 );
1717  }
1718  text_width = std::min( text_width, available_width );
1719  }
1720 
1721  if( text_width > 0 ) {
1722  const int text_x = cell_index == 0 ? x1 : x2 -
1723  text_width; // Align either to the left or to the right
1724 
1725  const std::string &hl_option = get_option<std::string>( "INVENTORY_HIGHLIGHT" );
1726  if( cell_index == 0 && entry.chevron ) {
1727  bool const hide_override = hide_entries_override && entry.any_item()->is_container();
1728  nc_color const col = entry.is_collation_header() ? c_light_blue : hide_override ?
1729  *hide_entries_override ? c_red : c_green : c_dark_gray;
1730  bool const stat = entry.is_collation_entry() ||
1731  !hide_override ? entry.collapsed : *hide_entries_override;
1732  trim_and_print( win, point( text_x - 1, yy ), 1, col,
1733  stat ? "" : "" );
1734  }
1735  if( entry.is_item() && ( selected || !entry.is_selectable() ) ) {
1736  trim_and_print( win, point( text_x, yy ), text_width, selected ? h_white : c_dark_gray,
1737  remove_color_tags( text ) );
1738  } else if( entry.is_item() && entry.highlight_as_parent ) {
1739  if( hl_option == "symbol" ) {
1740  trim_and_print( win, point( text_x - 1, yy ), 1, h_white, "<" );
1741  trim_and_print( win, point( text_x, yy ), text_width, entry_cell_cache.color, text );
1742  } else {
1743  trim_and_print( win, point( text_x, yy ), text_width, c_white_white,
1744  remove_color_tags( text ) );
1745  }
1746  entry.highlight_as_parent = false;
1747  } else if( entry.is_item() && entry.highlight_as_child ) {
1748  if( hl_option == "symbol" ) {
1749  trim_and_print( win, point( text_x - 1, yy ), 1, h_white, ">" );
1750  trim_and_print( win, point( text_x, yy ), text_width, entry_cell_cache.color, text );
1751  } else {
1752  trim_and_print( win, point( text_x, yy ), text_width, c_black_white,
1753  remove_color_tags( text ) );
1754  }
1755  entry.highlight_as_child = false;
1756  } else {
1757  trim_and_print( win, point( text_x, yy ), text_width, entry_cell_cache.color, text );
1758  }
1759  }
1760 
1761  x1 = x2;
1762  }
1763 
1764  if( entry.is_item() ) {
1765  int xx = p.x;
1766  if( entry.get_invlet() != '\0' ) {
1767  mvwputch( win, point( p.x, yy ), entry.get_invlet_color(), entry.get_invlet() );
1768  }
1769  xx += 2;
1770  if( get_option<bool>( "ITEM_SYMBOLS" ) ) {
1771  const nc_color color = entry.any_item()->color();
1772  mvwputch( win, point( xx, yy ), color, entry.any_item()->symbol() );
1773  xx += 2;
1774  }
1775  if( allows_selecting() && activatable() && multiselect ) {
1776  if( entry.chosen_count == 0 ) {
1777  mvwputch( win, point( xx, yy ), c_dark_gray, '-' );
1778  } else if( entry.chosen_count >= entry.get_available_count() ) {
1779  mvwputch( win, point( xx, yy ), c_light_green, '+' );
1780  } else {
1781  mvwputch( win, point( xx, yy ), c_light_green, '#' );
1782  }
1783  }
1784  }
1785  }
1786 
1787  if( pages_count() > 1 ) {
1788  mvwprintw( win, p + point( 0, height - 1 ), _( "Page %d/%d" ), page_index() + 1, pages_count() );
1789  }
1790 }

1823 void selection_column::prepare_paging( const std::string & )
1824 {
1825  // always show all selected items
1826  inventory_column::prepare_paging( std::string() );
1827 
1828  if( entries.empty() ) { // Category must always persist
1829  entries.emplace_back( &*selected_cat );
1830  expand_to_fit( entries.back(), false );
1831  }
1832 
1833  if( !last_changed.is_null() ) {
1834  const auto iter = std::find( entries.begin(), entries.end(), last_changed );
1835  if( iter != entries.end() ) {
1836  highlight( std::distance( entries.begin(), iter ), scroll_direction::FORWARD );
1837  }
1838  last_changed = inventory_entry();
1839  }
1840 }
1841 
1842 void selection_column::on_change( const inventory_entry &entry )
1843 {
1844  inventory_entry my_entry( entry, &*selected_cat );
1845 
1846  auto iter = std::find( entries.begin(), entries.end(), my_entry );
1847 
1848  if( iter == entries.end() ) {
1849  if( my_entry.chosen_count == 0 ) {
1850  return; // Not interested.
1851  }
1852  add_entry( my_entry )->make_entry_cell_cache( preset );
1853  paging_is_valid = false;
1854  last_changed = my_entry;
1855  } else if( iter->chosen_count != my_entry.chosen_count ) {
1856  if( my_entry.chosen_count > 0 ) {
1857  iter->chosen_count = my_entry.chosen_count;
1858  iter->make_entry_cell_cache( preset );
1859  } else {
1860  iter = entries.erase( iter );
1861  }
1862  paging_is_valid = false;
1863  if( iter != entries.end() ) {
1864  last_changed = *iter;
1865  }
1866  }
1867 }
1868 const item_category *inventory_selector::naturalize_category( const item_category &category,
1869  const tripoint &pos )
1870 {
1871  const auto find_cat_by_id = [ this ]( const item_category_id & id ) {
1872  const auto iter = std::find_if( categories.begin(),
1873  categories.end(), [ &id ]( const item_category & cat ) {
1874  return cat.get_id() == id;
1875  } );
1876  return iter != categories.end() ? &*iter : nullptr;
1877  };
1878 
1879  const int dist = rl_dist( u.pos(), pos );
1880 
1881  if( dist != 0 ) {
1882  const std::string suffix = direction_suffix( u.pos(), pos );
1883  const item_category_id id = item_category_id( string_format( "%s_%s", category.get_id().c_str(),
1884  suffix.c_str() ) );
1885 
1886  const auto *existing = find_cat_by_id( id );
1887  if( existing != nullptr ) {
1888  return existing;
1889  }
1890 
1891  const std::string name = string_format( "%s %s", category.name_header(), suffix.c_str() );
1892  const int sort_rank = category.sort_rank() + dist;
1893  const item_category new_category( id, no_translation( name ), translation(), sort_rank );
1894 
1895  categories.push_back( new_category );
1896  } else {
1897  const item_category *const existing = find_cat_by_id( category.get_id() );
1898  if( existing != nullptr ) {
1899  return existing;
1900  }
1901 
1902  categories.push_back( category );
1903  }
1904 
1905  return &categories.back();
1906 }

1908 inventory_entry *inventory_selector::add_entry( inventory_column &target_column,
1909  std::vector<item_location> &&locations,
1910  const item_category *custom_category,
1911  const size_t chosen_count, item_location const &topmost_parent,
1912  bool chevron )
1913 {
1914  if( !preset.is_shown( locations.front() ) ) {
1915  return nullptr;
1916  }
1917 
1918  is_empty = false;
1919  inventory_entry entry( locations, custom_category,
1920  true, chosen_count,
1921  entry_generation_number++, topmost_parent, chevron );
1922 
1923  entry.collapsed = locations.front()->is_collapsed();
1924  inventory_entry *const ret = target_column.add_entry( entry );
1925 
1926  shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> current_ui = ui.lock();
1927  if( current_ui ) {
1928  current_ui->mark_resize();
1929  }
1930 
1931  return ret;
1932 }

1934 bool inventory_selector::add_entry_rec( inventory_column &entry_column,
1935  inventory_column &children_column, item_location &loc,
1936  item_category const *entry_category,
1937  item_category const *children_category,
1938  item_location const &topmost_parent, int indent )
1939 {
1940  inventory_column temp_children( preset );
1941  bool vis_contents =
1942  add_contained_items( loc, temp_children, children_category,
1943  get_topmost_parent( topmost_parent, loc, preset ),
1944  preset.is_shown( loc ) ? indent + 2 : indent );
1945  inventory_entry *const nentry = add_entry( entry_column, std::vector<item_location>( 1, loc ),
1946  entry_category, 0, topmost_parent );
1947  if( nentry != nullptr ) {
1948  nentry->chevron = vis_contents;
1949  nentry->indent = indent;
1950  vis_contents = true;
1951  }
1952  temp_children.move_entries_to( children_column );
1953 
1954  return vis_contents;
1955 }
1956 
1957 bool inventory_selector::drag_drop_item( item *sourceItem, item *destItem )
1958 {
1959  if( sourceItem == destItem ) {
1960  return false;
1961  }
1962  auto pockets = destItem->get_all_contained_pockets();
1963  if( pockets.empty() ) {
1964  popup( _( "Destination has no pockets." ) );
1965  return false;
1966  }
1967  int base_move_cost = 0;
1968  auto parentContainers = u.parents( *sourceItem );
1969  for( item *parent : parentContainers ) {
1970  base_move_cost += parent->obtain_cost( *sourceItem );
1971  }
1972  std::vector<item_pocket *> containable_pockets;
1973  uilist action_menu;
1974  action_menu.text = _( "Select pocket" );
1975  int index = 0;
1976  bool any_containable = false;
1977  for( item_pocket *pocket : pockets ) {
1978  std::string pocket_text = string_format( _( "%s - %s/%s | %d moves" ),
1979  pocket->get_description().translated(), vol_to_info( "", "", pocket->contains_volume() ).sValue,
1980  vol_to_info( "", "", pocket->max_contains_volume() ).sValue, pocket->moves() + base_move_cost );
1981  action_menu.addentry( index++, true, std::optional<input_event>(), pocket_text );
1982  ret_val<item_pocket::contain_code> contain = pocket->can_contain( *sourceItem );
1983  if( contain.success() ) {
1984  any_containable = true;
1985  } else {
1986  action_menu.entries.back().enabled = false;
1987  }
1988  }
1989  if( !any_containable ) {
1990  tname::segment_bitset segs( tname::unprefixed_tname );
1991  segs.set( tname::segments::CONTENTS, false );
1992  popup( string_format( _( "%s contains no pockets that can contain item." ),
1993  destItem->tname( 1, segs ) ) );
1994  return false;
1995  }
1996  action_menu.query();
1997  if( action_menu.ret >= 0 && static_cast<size_t>( action_menu.ret ) < pockets.size() ) {
1998  ret_val<item_pocket::contain_code> contain = pockets[action_menu.ret]->can_contain( *sourceItem );
1999  if( contain.success() ) {
2000  // storage should mimick character inserting
2001  u.store( pockets[action_menu.ret], *sourceItem, true, base_move_cost );
2002  return true;
2003  } else {
2004  popup( _( "Cannot put item in pocket: %s" ), contain.str() );
2005  return false;
2006  }
2007  }
2008 
2009  return false;
2010 }
2011

2013 {
2014  return add_contained_items( container, own_inv_column );
2015 }
2016 
2017 bool inventory_selector::add_contained_items( item_location &container, inventory_column &column,
2018  const item_category *const custom_category, item_location const &topmost_parent, int indent )
2019 {
2020  if( container->has_flag( STATIC( flag_id( "NO_UNLOAD" ) ) ) ) {
2021  return false;
2022  }
2023 
2024  std::list<item *> const items = preset.get_pocket_type() == pocket_type::LAST
2025  ? container->all_items_top()
2026  : container->all_items_top( preset.get_pocket_type() );
2027 
2028  bool vis_top = false;
2029  inventory_column temp( preset );
2030  for( item *it : items ) {
2031  item_location child( container, it );
2032  item_category const *hacked_cat = custom_category;
2033  inventory_column *hacked_col = &column;
2034  if( is_worn_ablative( container, child ) ) {
2035  hacked_cat = &item_category_ITEMS_WORN.obj();
2036  hacked_col = &own_gear_column;
2037  }
2038  vis_top |= add_entry_rec( *hacked_col, temp, child, hacked_cat, custom_category,
2039  topmost_parent, indent );
2040  }
2041  temp.move_entries_to( column );
2042  return vis_top;
2043 }

2194 bool inventory_selector::highlight( const item_location &loc, bool hidden, bool front_only )
2195 {
2196  bool res = false;
2197 
2198  for( size_t i = 0; i < columns.size(); ++i ) {
2199  inventory_column *elem = columns[i];
2200  if( !elem->visible() ) {
2201  continue;
2202  }
2203  bool found = false;
2204  if( hidden ) {
2205  if( inventory_entry *ent = elem->find_by_location( loc, true ) ) {
2206  item_location const &parent = ent->is_collation_entry() ? ent->collation_meta->tip :
2207  ent->topmost_parent;
2208  if( !parent ) {
2209  continue;
2210  }
2211  inventory_entry *pent = elem->find_by_location( parent );
2212  if( elem != nullptr ) {
2213  elem->set_collapsed( *pent, false );
2214  prepare_layout();
2215  found = elem->highlight( loc, true );
2216  }
2217  }
2218  } else {
2219  found = elem->highlight( loc, front_only );
2220  }
2221  if( found && !res && elem->activatable() ) {
2222  set_active_column( i );
2223  res = true;
2224  }
2225  }
2226 
2227  return res;
2228 }

2235  return {};

2238  return ent.locations.front();
2239  }
2240 
2241  item_location const &loc_cur = ent.locations.front();
2242  inventory_entry const &p_ent = *col.find_by_location( ent.collation_meta->tip );
2243  auto iter = std::find( p_ent.locations.begin(), p_ent.locations.end(), loc_cur );
2244  if( iter == --p_ent.locations.end() ) {
2245  return *--iter;
2246  }
2247

2297 // FIXME: if columns are merged due to low screen width, they will not be splitted
2298 // once screen width becomes enough for the columns.
2299 void inventory_selector::rearrange_columns( size_t client_width )
2300 {
2301  const inventory_entry &prev_entry = get_highlighted();
2302  const item_location prev_selection = prev_entry.is_item() ?
2303  prev_entry.any_item() : item_location::nowhere;
2304  bool const front_only = prev_entry.is_collation_entry();
2305  if( ( is_overflown( client_width ) || force_single_column ) && !own_gear_column.empty() ) {
2306  if( own_inv_column.empty() ) {
2307  own_inv_column.set_indent_entries_override( own_gear_column.indent_entries() );
2308  }
2309  own_gear_column.move_entries_to( own_inv_column );
2310  own_inv_column.reset_width( {} );
2311  }
2312  if( ( is_overflown( client_width ) || force_single_column ) && !map_column.empty() ) {
2313  if( own_inv_column.empty() ) {
2314  own_inv_column.set_indent_entries_override( map_column.indent_entries() );
2315  }
2316  map_column.move_entries_to( own_inv_column );
2317  own_inv_column.reset_width( {} );
2318  }
2319  if( prev_selection ) {
2320  highlight( prev_selection, false, front_only );
2321  }
2322 }
2323 
2324 void inventory_selector::prepare_layout( size_t client_width, size_t client_height )
2325 {
2326  // This block adds categories and should go before any width evaluations
2327  const bool initial = get_active_column().get_highlighted_index() == static_cast<size_t>( -1 );
2328  for( inventory_column *&elem : columns ) {
2329  elem->set_height( client_height );
2330  elem->prepare_paging( filter );
2331  elem->reset_width( columns );
2332  }
2333 
2334  // Handle screen overflow
2335  rearrange_columns( client_width );
2336  if( initial ) {
2337  get_active_column().highlight( 0, scroll_direction::FORWARD );
2338  }
2339  // If we have a single column and it occupies more than a half of
2340  // the available with -> expand it
2341  auto visible_columns = get_visible_columns();
2342  if( visible_columns.size() == 1 && are_columns_centered( client_width ) ) {
2343  visible_columns.front()->set_width( client_width );
2344  }
2345 
2346  reassign_custom_invlets();
2347 
2348  refresh_active_column();
2349 }
2350 
2351 void inventory_selector::reassign_custom_invlets()
2352 {
2353  if( invlet_type_ == SELECTOR_INVLET_DEFAULT || invlet_type_ == SELECTOR_INVLET_NUMERIC ) {
2354  bool use_num_invlet = uistate.numpad_navigation ? false : use_invlet;
2355  int min_invlet = static_cast<uint8_t>( use_num_invlet ? '0' : '\0' );
2356  for( inventory_column *elem : columns ) {
2357  elem->prepare_paging();
2358  min_invlet = elem->reassign_custom_invlets( u, min_invlet, use_num_invlet ? '9' : '\0' );
2359  }
2360  } else if( invlet_type_ == SELECTOR_INVLET_ALPHA ) {
2361  const std::string all_pickup_chars = use_invlet ?
2362  "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ:;" : "";
2363  std::string pickup_chars = ctxt.get_available_single_char_hotkeys( all_pickup_chars );
2364  int cur_idx = 0;
2365  auto elemfilter = []( const inventory_entry & e ) {
2366  return e.is_item() && e.any_item()->invlet > '\0';
2367  };
2368  // First pass -> remove letters taken by user-set invlets
2369  for( inventory_column *elem : columns ) {
2370  for( inventory_entry *e : elem->get_entries( elemfilter ) ) {
2371  const char c = e->any_item()->invlet;
2372  if( pickup_chars.find_first_of( c ) != std::string::npos ) {
2373  pickup_chars.erase( std::remove( pickup_chars.begin(), pickup_chars.end(), c ),
2374  pickup_chars.end() );
2375  }
2376  }
2377  }
2378  for( inventory_column *elem : columns ) {
2379  elem->prepare_paging();
2380  cur_idx = elem->reassign_custom_invlets( cur_idx, pickup_chars );
2381  }
2382  }
2383 }
2384 
2385 void inventory_selector::prepare_layout()
2386 {
2387  startup_timer const tp_prep =
2388  std::chrono::time_point_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>( std::chrono::steady_clock::now() );
2389 
2390  const auto snap = []( size_t cur_dim, size_t max_dim ) {
2391  return cur_dim + 2 * max_win_snap_distance >= max_dim ? max_dim : cur_dim;
2392  };
2393 
2394  const int nc_width = 2 * ( 1 + border );
2395  const int nc_height = get_header_height() + 1 + 2 * border;
2396 
2397  prepare_layout( TERMX - nc_width, TERMY - nc_height );
2398 
2399  int const win_width =
2400  _fixed_size.x < 0 ? snap( get_layout_width() + nc_width, TERMX ) : _fixed_size.x;
2401  int const win_height =
2402  _fixed_size.y < 0
2403  ? snap( std::max<int>( get_layout_height() + nc_height, FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT ), TERMY )
2404  : _fixed_size.y;
2405 
2406  prepare_layout( win_width - nc_width, win_height - nc_height );
2407 
2408  resize_window( win_width, win_height );
2409 
2410  debug_print_timer( tp_prep, "prepare_layout took" );
2411 }

2413 shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> inventory_selector::create_or_get_ui_adaptor()
2414 {
2415  shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> current_ui = ui.lock();
2416  if( !current_ui ) {
2417  ui = current_ui = make_shared_fast<ui_adaptor>();
2418  current_ui->on_screen_resize( [this]( ui_adaptor & ) {
2419  prepare_layout();
2420  } );
2421  current_ui->mark_resize();
2422 
2423  current_ui->on_redraw( [this]( const ui_adaptor & ) {
2424  refresh_window();
2425  } );
2426  }
2427  return current_ui;
2428 }

2430 size_t inventory_selector::get_layout_width() const
2431 {
2432  const size_t min_hud_width = std::max( get_header_min_width(), get_footer_min_width() );
2433  const auto visible_columns = get_visible_columns();
2434  const size_t gaps = visible_columns.size() > 1 ? normal_column_gap * ( visible_columns.size() - 1 )
2435  : 0;
2436 
2437  return std::max( get_columns_width( visible_columns ) + gaps, min_hud_width );
2438 }

2440 size_t inventory_selector::get_layout_height() const
2441 {
2442  const auto visible_columns = get_visible_columns();
2443  // Find and return the highest column's height.
2444  const auto iter = std::max_element( visible_columns.begin(), visible_columns.end(),
2445  []( const inventory_column * lhs, const inventory_column * rhs ) {
2446  return lhs->get_height() < rhs->get_height();
2447  } );
2448 
2449  return iter != visible_columns.end() ? ( *iter )->get_height() : 1;
2450 }

2456  : 1;

2459 size_t inventory_selector::get_header_min_width() const
2460 {
2461  const size_t titles_width = std::max( utf8_width( title, true ),
2462  utf8_width( hint, true ) );
2463  if( !display_stats ) {
2464  return titles_width;
2465  }
2466 
2467  size_t stats_width = 0;
2468  for( const std::string &elem : get_stats() ) {
2469  stats_width = std::max( static_cast<size_t>( utf8_width( elem, true ) ), stats_width );
2470  }
2471

2473 }

2475 size_t inventory_selector::get_footer_min_width() const

2479

2481  result = std::max( static_cast<size_t>( utf8_width( get_footer( m ).first, true ) ) + 2 + 4,
2482  result );
2483  m = get_navigation_data( m ).next_mode;
2484  } while( m != mode );
2485 
2486  return result;
2487 }

2578 
2579 std::vector<std::string> inventory_selector::get_stats() const
2580 {
2581  // Stats consist of arrays of cells.
2582  const size_t num_stats = 3;
2583  const std::array<stat, num_stats> stats = get_raw_stats();
2584  // Streams for every stat.
2585  std::array<std::string, num_stats> lines;
2586  std::array<size_t, num_stats> widths;
2587  // Add first cells and spaces after them.
2588  for( size_t i = 0; i < stats.size(); ++i ) {
2589  lines[i] += string_format( "%s", stats[i][0] ) + " ";
2590  }
2591  // Now add the rest of the cells and align them to the right.
2592  for( size_t j = 1; j < stats.front().size(); ++j ) {
2593  // Calculate actual cell width for each stat.
2594  std::transform( stats.begin(), stats.end(), widths.begin(),
2595  [j]( const stat & elem ) {
2596  return utf8_width( elem[j], true );
2597  } );
2598  // Determine the max width.
2599  const size_t max_w = *std::max_element( widths.begin(), widths.end() );
2600  // Align all stats in this cell with spaces.
2601  for( size_t i = 0; i < stats.size(); ++i ) {
2602  if( max_w > widths[i] ) {
2603  lines[i] += std::string( max_w - widths[i], ' ' );
2604  }
2605  lines[i] += string_format( "%s", stats[i][j] );
2606  }
2607  }
2608  // Construct the final result.
2609  return std::vector<std::string>( lines.begin(), lines.end() );
2610 }

2613 {
2614  point origin = _fixed_origin;

2617  }
2618  w_inv = catacurses::newwin( height, width, origin );
2619  if( spopup ) {
2620  spopup->window( w_inv, point( 4, getmaxy( w_inv ) - 1 ), ( getmaxx( w_inv ) / 2 ) - 4 );
2621  }
2622  shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> current_ui = ui.lock();
2623  if( current_ui ) {
2624  current_ui->position_from_window( w_inv );
2625  }
2626 }

2646 std::pair< bool, std::string > inventory_selector::query_string( const std::string &val,
2647  bool end_with_toggle )
2648 {
2649  spopup = std::make_unique<string_input_popup>();
2650  spopup->max_length( 256 )
2651  .text( val );
2652  spopup->identifier( "item_filter" ).hist_use_uilist( false );
2653  if( end_with_toggle ) {
2654  for( input_event const &iev : inp_mngr.get_input_for_action( "TOGGLE_ENTRY", "INVENTORY" ) ) {
2655  spopup->add_callback( iev.get_first_input(), [this]() {
2656  spopup->confirm();
2657  return true;
2658  } );
2659  }
2660  };
2661 
2662  shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> current_ui = ui.lock();
2663  if( current_ui ) {
2664  current_ui->mark_resize();
2665  }
2666 
2667  do {
2668  ui_manager::redraw();
2669  spopup->query_string( /*loop=*/false );
2670  } while( !spopup->confirmed() && !spopup->canceled() );
2671 
2672  std::string rval;
2673  bool confirmed = spopup->confirmed();
2674  if( confirmed ) {
2675  rval = spopup->text();
2676  }
2677 
2678  spopup.reset();
2679  return std::make_pair( confirmed, rval );
2680 }

2690 int inventory_selector::query_count( char init, bool end_with_toggle )
2691 {
2692  std::string sinit = init != 0 ? std::string( 1, init ) : std::string();
2693  std::pair< bool, std::string > query = query_string( sinit, end_with_toggle );
2694  int ret = -1;
2695  if( query.first ) {
2696  try {
2697  ret = std::stoi( query.second );
2698  } catch( const std::invalid_argument &e ) {
2699  // TODO Tell User they did a bad
2700  ret = -1;
2701  } catch( const std::out_of_range &e ) {
2702  ret = INT_MAX;
2703  }
2704  }
2705 
2706  return ret;
2707 }

2722 void inventory_selector::draw_columns( const catacurses::window &w )
2723 {
2724  const auto columns = get_visible_columns();
2725 
2726  const int screen_width = getmaxx( w ) - 2 * ( border + 1 );
2727  const bool centered = are_columns_centered( screen_width );
2728 
2729  const int free_space = screen_width - get_columns_width( columns );
2730  const int max_gap = ( columns.size() > 1 ) ? free_space / ( static_cast<int>
2731  ( columns.size() ) - 1 ) :
2732  free_space;
2733  const int gap = centered ? max_gap : std::min<int>( max_gap, normal_column_gap );
2734  const int gap_rounding_error = centered && columns.size() > 1
2735  ? free_space % ( columns.size() - 1 ) : 0;
2736 
2737  size_t x = border + 1;
2738  size_t y = get_header_height() + border + 1;
2739  size_t active_x = 0;
2740 
2741  rect_entry_map.clear();
2742  for( inventory_column * const &elem : columns ) {
2743  if( &elem == &columns.back() ) {
2744  x += gap_rounding_error;
2745  }
2746  if( !is_active_column( *elem ) ) {
2747  elem->draw( w, point( x, y ), rect_entry_map );
2748  } else {
2749  active_x = x;
2750  }
2751  x += elem->get_width() + gap;
2752  }
2753 
2754  get_active_column().draw( w, point( active_x, y ), rect_entry_map );
2755  if( empty() ) {
2756  center_print( w, getmaxy( w ) / 2, c_dark_gray, _( "Your inventory is empty." ) );
2757  }
2758 }

2765  mvwhline( w, point( 0, y ), LINE_XXXO, 1 );
2766  mvwhline( w, point( getmaxx( w ) - border, y ), LINE_XOXX, 1 );
2767 }

2778 void inventory_selector::draw_footer( const catacurses::window &w ) const
2779 {
2780  if( spopup ) {
2781  mvwprintz( w_inv, point( 2, getmaxy( w_inv ) - 1 ), c_cyan, "< " );
2782  mvwprintz( w_inv, point( ( getmaxx( w_inv ) / 2 ) - 4, getmaxy( w_inv ) - 1 ), c_cyan, " >" );
2783 
2784  spopup->query_string( /*loop=*/false, /*draw_only=*/true );
2785  } else {
2786  int filter_offset = 0;
2787  if( has_available_choices() || !filter.empty() ) {
2788  std::string text = string_format( filter.empty() ? _( "[%s] Filter" ) : _( "[%s] Filter: " ),
2789  ctxt.get_desc( "INVENTORY_FILTER" ) );
2790  filter_offset = utf8_width( text + filter ) + 6;
2791 
2792  mvwprintz( w, point( 2, getmaxy( w ) - border ), c_light_gray, "< " );
2793  wprintz( w, c_light_gray, text );
2794  wprintz( w, c_white, filter );
2795  wprintz( w, c_light_gray, " >" );
2796  }
2797 
2798  right_print( w, getmaxy( w ) - border, border + 1, c_light_gray,
2799  string_format( "< [%s] %s >", ctxt.get_desc( "VIEW_CATEGORY_MODE" ),
2800  io::enum_to_string( _uimode ) ) );
2801  const auto footer = get_footer( mode );
2802  if( !footer.first.empty() ) {
2803  const int string_width = utf8_width( footer.first );
2804  const int x1 = filter_offset + std::max( getmaxx( w ) - string_width - filter_offset, 0 ) / 2;
2805  const int x2 = x1 + string_width - 1;
2806  const int y = getmaxy( w ) - border;
2807 
2808  mvwprintz( w, point( x1, y ), footer.second, footer.first );
2809  mvwputch( w, point( x1 - 1, y ), c_light_gray, ' ' );
2810  mvwputch( w, point( x2 + 1, y ), c_light_gray, ' ' );
2811  mvwputch( w, point( x1 - 2, y ), c_light_gray, LINE_XOXX );
2812  mvwputch( w, point( x2 + 2, y ), c_light_gray, LINE_XXXO );
2813  }
2814  }
2815 }

2931 inventory_input inventory_selector::process_input( const std::string &action, int ch )
2932 {
2933  inventory_input res{ action, ch, nullptr };
2934 
2935  if( res.action == "SELECT" || res.action == "COORDINATE" || res.action == "MOUSE_MOVE" ||
2936  res.action == "CLICK_AND_DRAG" ) {
2937  std::optional<point> o_p = ctxt.get_coordinates_text( w_inv );
2938  if( o_p ) {
2939  point p = o_p.value();
2940  if( window_contains_point_relative( w_inv, p ) ) {
2941  res.entry = find_entry_by_coordinate( p );
2942  if( res.entry != nullptr && res.entry->is_selectable() ) {
2943  return res;
2944  }
2945  if( res.entry == nullptr && res.action == "SELECT" ) {
2946  p.x++;
2947  res.entry = find_entry_by_coordinate( p );
2948  // if the user has clicked the coordinate just to the left of a pocket, they are clicking the pocket's expander icon
2949  if( res.entry != nullptr && res.entry->is_selectable() && res.entry->chevron ) {
2950  res.action = "SHOW_HIDE_CONTENTS";
2951  return res;
2952  }
2953  }
2954  }
2955  }
2956  }
2957 
2958  res.entry = find_entry_by_invlet( res.ch );
2959  if( res.entry != nullptr && !res.entry->is_selectable() ) {
2960  res.entry = nullptr;
2961  }
2962  return res;
2963 }

2984 void inventory_selector::on_input( const inventory_input &input )
2985 {
2986  if( input.action == "CATEGORY_SELECTION" ) {
2987  toggle_navigation_mode();
2988  } else if( input.action == "PREV_COLUMN" ) {
2989  toggle_active_column( scroll_direction::BACKWARD );
2990  } else if( input.action == "NEXT_COLUMN" ) {
2991  toggle_active_column( scroll_direction::FORWARD );
2992  } else if( input.action == "VIEW_CATEGORY_MODE" ) {
2993  toggle_categorize_contained();
2994  } else if( input.action == "TOGGLE_NUMPAD_NAVIGATION" ) {
2995  uistate.numpad_navigation = !uistate.numpad_navigation;
2996  reassign_custom_invlets();
2997  } else if( input.action == "EXAMINE_CONTENTS" ) {
2998  const inventory_entry &selected = get_active_column().get_highlighted();
2999  if( selected ) {
3000  //TODO: Should probably be any_item() rather than direct front() access, but that seems to lock us into const item_location, which various functions are unprepared for
3001  item_location sitem = selected.locations.front();
3002  inventory_examiner examine_contents( u, sitem );
3003  examine_contents.add_contained_items( sitem );
3004  int examine_result = examine_contents.execute();
3005  if( examine_result == EXAMINED_CONTENTS_WITH_CHANGES ) {
3006  //The user changed something while examining, so rebuild paging
3007  for( inventory_column *elem : columns ) {
3008  elem->invalidate_paging();
3009  }
3010  } else if( examine_result == NO_CONTENTS_TO_EXAMINE ) {
3011  action_examine( sitem );
3012  }
3013  }
3014  } else if( input.action == "EXAMINE" ) {
3015  const inventory_entry &selected = get_active_column().get_highlighted();
3016  if( selected ) {
3017  const item_location &sitem = selected.any_item();
3018  action_examine( sitem );
3019  }
3020  } else if( input.action == "INVENTORY_FILTER" ) {
3021  query_set_filter();
3022  ui.lock()->mark_resize();
3023  } else if( input.action == "RESET_FILTER" ) {
3024  set_filter( "" );
3025  ui.lock()->mark_resize();
3026  } else if( input.action == "TOGGLE_SKIP_UNSELECTABLE" ) {
3027  toggle_skip_unselectable();
3028  } else {
3029  for( inventory_column *elem : columns ) {
3030  elem->on_input( input );
3031  }
3032  refresh_active_column(); // Columns can react to actions by losing their activation capacity
3033  if( input.action == "TOGGLE_FAVORITE" ) {
3034  // Favoriting items changes item name length which may require resizing
3035  shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> current_ui = ui.lock();
3036  if( current_ui ) {
3037  current_ui->mark_resize();
3038  }
3039  }
3040  if( input.action == "SHOW_HIDE_CONTENTS_ALL" ) {
3041  for( inventory_column *col : columns ) {
3042  col->cycle_hide_override();
3043  }
3044  }
3045  if( input.action == "SHOW_HIDE_CONTENTS" || input.action == "SHOW_HIDE_CONTENTS_ALL" ) {
3046  shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> current_ui = ui.lock();
3047  for( inventory_column * const &col : columns ) {
3048  col->invalidate_paging();
3049  }
3050  if( current_ui ) {
3051  std::vector<item_location> inv = get_highlighted().locations;
3052  current_ui->mark_resize();
3053  highlight_one_of( inv );
3054  }
3055  }
3056  }
3057 }

3130 void inventory_selector::_categorize( inventory_column &col )

3134  const item_location loc = entry->any_item();
3135  // ensure top-level equipped entries don't lose their special categories
3136  const item_category *custom_category = wielded_worn_category( loc, u );
3137 
3138  entry->set_custom_category( custom_category );
3139  }
3140  col.set_indent_entries_override( false );
3141  col.invalidate_paging();
3142  col.uncollate();

3145 void inventory_selector::_uncategorize( inventory_column &col )
3146 {
3147  for( inventory_entry *entry : col.get_entries( return_item, true ) ) {
3148  // find the topmost parent of the entry's item and categorize it by that
3149  // to form the hierarchy
3150  item_location ancestor = entry->any_item();
3151  while( ancestor.has_parent() ) {
3152  ancestor = ancestor.parent_item();
3153  }
3154 
3155  const item_category *custom_category = nullptr;
3156  if( ancestor.where() != item_location::type::character ) {
3157  const std::string name = to_upper_case( remove_color_tags( ancestor.describe() ) );
3158  const item_category map_cat( name, no_translation( name ), translation(), 100 );
3159  custom_category = naturalize_category( map_cat, ancestor.position() );
3160  } else {
3161  custom_category = wielded_worn_category( ancestor, u );
3162  }
3163 
3164  entry->set_custom_category( custom_category );
3165  }
3166  col.clear_indent_entries_override();
3167  col.invalidate_paging();
3168  col.uncollate();
3169 }

3171 void inventory_selector::toggle_categorize_contained()
3172 {
3173  std::vector<item_location> highlighted;
3174  if( get_highlighted().is_item() ) {
3175  highlighted = get_highlighted().locations;
3176  }
3177 
3178  if( _uimode == uimode::hierarchy ) {
3179  inventory_column replacement_column;
3180 
3181  // split entries into either worn/held gear or contained items
3182  for( inventory_entry *entry : own_gear_column.get_entries( return_item, true ) ) {
3183  const item_location loc = entry->any_item();
3184  inventory_column *col = is_container( loc ) && !is_worn_ablative( loc.parent_item(), loc ) ?
3185  &own_inv_column : &replacement_column;
3186  col->add_entry( *entry );
3187  }
3188  own_gear_column.clear();
3189  replacement_column.move_entries_to( own_gear_column );
3190 
3191  for( inventory_column *col : columns ) {
3192  _categorize( *col );
3193  }
3194  _uimode = uimode::categories;
3195  } else {
3196  // move all entries into one big gear column and turn into hierarchy
3197  own_inv_column.move_entries_to( own_gear_column );
3198  for( inventory_column *col : columns ) {
3199  _uncategorize( *col );
3200  }
3201  _uimode = uimode::hierarchy;
3202  }
3203 
3204  if( !highlighted.empty() ) {
3205  highlight_one_of( highlighted );
3206  }
3207 
3208  // needs to be called now so that new invlets can be assigned
3209  // and subclasses w/ selection columns can then re-populate entries
3210  // using the new invlets
3211  prepare_layout();
3212 
3213  // invalidate, but dont mark resize, to avoid re-calling prepare_layout()
3214  // and as a consequence reassign_custom_invlets()
3215  shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> current_ui = ui.lock();
3216  if( current_ui ) {
3217  current_ui->invalidate_ui();

3221 void inventory_selector::toggle_active_column( scroll_direction dir )
3222 {
3223  if( columns.empty() ) {
3224  return;
3225  }
3226 
3227  size_t index = active_column_index;
3228 
3229  do {
3230  switch( dir ) {
3231  case scroll_direction::FORWARD:
3232  index = index + 1 < columns.size() ? index + 1 : 0;
3233  break;
3234  case scroll_direction::BACKWARD:
3235  index = index > 0 ? index - 1 : columns.size() - 1;
3236  break;
3237  }
3238  } while( index != active_column_index && !get_column( index ).activatable() );
3239 
3240  set_active_column( index );
3241 }

3277 item_location inventory_pick_selector::execute()
3278 {
3279  shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> ui = create_or_get_ui_adaptor();
3280  debug_print_timer( tp_start );
3281  item_location startDragItem;
3282  bool dragActive = false;
3283  while( true ) {
3284  ui_manager::redraw();
3285  const inventory_input input = get_input();
3286 
3287  if( input.entry != nullptr ) {
3288  if( drag_enabled && input.action == "CLICK_AND_DRAG" ) {
3289  if( input.entry->is_item() ) {
3290  dragActive = true;
3291  startDragItem = input.entry->locations.front();
3292  }
3293  } else if( input.action == "MOUSE_MOVE" ) {
3294  if( !dragActive && highlight( input.entry->any_item() ) ) {
3295  ui_manager::redraw();
3296  }
3297  } else if( input.action == "SELECT" ) {
3298  dragActive = false;
3299  item_location startDragItemCpy = startDragItem;
3300  startDragItem = item_location();
3301  item_location endDragItem;
3302  if( input.entry->is_item() ) {
3303  endDragItem = input.entry->locations.front();
3304  if( startDragItemCpy && endDragItem && startDragItemCpy != endDragItem ) {
3305  if( drag_drop_item( startDragItemCpy.get_item(), endDragItem.get_item() ) ) {
3306  clear_items();
3307  add_character_items( u );
3308  }
3309  } else {
3310  return input.entry->any_item();
3311  }
3312  }
3313  } else if( input.action != "MOUSE_MOVE" && input.action != "COORDINATE" ) {
3314  return input.entry->any_item();
3315  } else {
3316  if( !dragActive && highlight( input.entry->any_item() ) ) {
3317  ui_manager::redraw();
3318  }
3319  on_input( input );
3320  }
3321  } else if( input.action == "ORGANIZE_MENU" ) {
3322  u.worn.organize_items_menu();
3323  return item_location();
3324  } else if( input.action == "QUIT" ) {
3325  return item_location();
3326  } else if( input.action == "CONFIRM" ) {
3327  const inventory_entry &highlighted = get_active_column().get_highlighted();
3328  if( highlighted && highlighted.is_selectable() ) {
3329  return highlighted.any_item();
3330  }
3331  } else {
3332  on_input( input );
3333  }
3334  }
3335 }
