3417 drop_location ammo_inventory_selector::execute()
3418 {
3419  shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> ui = create_or_get_ui_adaptor();
3420  debug_print_timer( tp_start );
3421  while( true ) {
3422  ui_manager::redraw();
3423  const inventory_input input = get_input();
3424 
3425  if( input.entry != nullptr ) {
3426  if( input.action == "MOUSE_MOVE" ) {
3427  if( highlight( input.entry->any_item() ) ) {
3428  ui_manager::redraw();
3429  }
3430  } else if( input.action == "ANY_INPUT" || input.action == "SELECT" ) {
3431  return { input.entry->any_item(), static_cast<int>( input.entry->chosen_count ) };
3432  } else {
3433  if( highlight( input.entry->any_item() ) ) {
3434  ui_manager::redraw();
3435  }
3436  on_input( input );
3437  }
3438  } else if( input.action == "QUIT" ) {
3439  return drop_location();
3440  } else if( input.action == "CONFIRM" ) {
3441  const inventory_entry &highlighted = get_active_column().get_highlighted();
3442  if( highlighted && highlighted.is_selectable() ) {
3443  return { highlighted.any_item(), static_cast<int>( highlighted.chosen_count ) };
3444  }
3445  } else if( input.action == "INCREASE_COUNT" ) {
3446  inventory_entry &highlighted = get_active_column().get_highlighted();
3447  mod_chosen_count( highlighted, 1 );
3448  } else if( input.action == "DECREASE_COUNT" ) {
3449  inventory_entry &highlighted = get_active_column().get_highlighted();
3450  mod_chosen_count( highlighted, -1 );
3451  } else {
3452  on_input( input );
3453  }
3454  }
3455 }

3476 void inventory_selector::highlight()
3477 {
3478  const inventory_entry &selected = get_active_column().get_highlighted();
3479  if( !selected.is_item() ) {
3480  return;
3481  }
3482  item_location parent = item_location::nowhere;
3483  bool selected_has_parent = false;
3484  if( selected.is_item() && selected.any_item().has_parent() ) {
3485  parent = selected.any_item().parent_item();
3486  selected_has_parent = true;
3487  }
3488  for( const inventory_column *column : get_all_columns() ) {
3489  for( inventory_entry *entry : column->get_entries( return_item ) ) {
3490  // Find parent of selected.
3491  if( selected_has_parent ) {
3492  // Check if parent is in a stack.
3493  for( const item_location &test_loc : entry->locations ) {
3494  if( test_loc == parent ) {
3495  entry->highlight_as_parent = true;
3496  break;
3497  }
3498  }
3499  }
3500  // Find contents of selected.
3501  if( !entry->any_item().has_parent() ) {
3502  continue;
3503  }
3504  // More than one item can be highlighted when selected container is stacked.
3505  for( const item_location &location : selected.locations ) {
3506  if( entry->any_item().parent_item() == location ) {
3507  entry->highlight_as_child = true;
3508  }
3509  }
3510  }
3511  }
3512 }

3553 
3554 void inventory_multiselector::set_chosen_count( inventory_entry &entry, size_t count )
3555 {
3556  const item_location &it = entry.any_item();
3557 
3558  /* Since we're modifying selection of this entry, we need to clear out
3559  anything that's been set before.
3560  */
3561  for( const item_location &loc : entry.locations ) {
3562  for( auto iter = to_use.begin(); iter != to_use.end(); ) {
3563  if( iter->first == loc ) {
3564  iter = to_use.erase( iter );
3565  } else {
3566  ++iter;
3567  }
3568  }
3569  }
3570 
3571  if( count == 0 ) {
3572  entry.chosen_count = 0;
3573  } else {
3574  size_t size_before = to_use.size();
3575  entry.chosen_count = std::min( {count, max_chosen_count, entry.get_available_count() } );
3576  if( it->count_by_charges() ) {
3577  auto iter = find_if( to_use.begin(),
3578  to_use.begin() + size_before, [&it]( const drop_location & drop ) {
3579  return drop.first == it;
3580  } );
3581  if( iter == to_use.begin() + size_before ) {
3582  to_use.emplace_back( it, static_cast<int>( entry.chosen_count ) );
3583  }
3584  } else {
3585  for( const item_location &loc : entry.locations ) {
3586  if( count == 0 ) {
3587  break;
3588  }
3589  auto iter = find_if( to_use.begin(),
3590  to_use.begin() + size_before, [&loc]( const drop_location & drop ) {
3591  return drop.first == loc;
3592  } );
3593  if( iter == to_use.begin() + size_before ) {
3594  to_use.emplace_back( loc, 1 );
3595  }
3596  count--;
3597  }
3598  }
3599  }
3600 
3601  on_change( entry );
3602 }
3603 
3604 void inventory_multiselector::toggle_entries( int &count, const toggle_mode mode )
3605 {
3606  std::vector<inventory_entry *> selected;
3607  switch( mode ) {
3608  case toggle_mode::SELECTED:
3609  selected = get_active_column().get_all_selected();
3610  break;
3611  case toggle_mode::NON_FAVORITE_NON_WORN: {
3612  const auto filter_to_nonfavorite_and_nonworn = [this]( const inventory_entry & entry ) {
3613  return entry.is_selectable() &&
3614  !entry.any_item()->is_favorite &&
3615  !u.is_worn( *entry.any_item() );
3616  };
3617 
3618  selected = get_active_column().get_entries( filter_to_nonfavorite_and_nonworn );
3619  }
3620  }
3621 
3622  // Deal with entries that can be highlighted but not selected (e.g. items too large to pick up)
3623  inventory_entry &highlighted_entry = get_active_column().get_highlighted();
3624  if( mode == toggle_mode::SELECTED
3625  && !highlighted_entry.is_selectable() && highlighted_entry.is_item() ) {
3626  cata_assert( highlighted_entry.denial.has_value() );
3627  const std::string &denial = *highlighted_entry.denial;
3628 
3629  if( !denial.empty() ) {
3630  const std::string assembled = highlighted_entry.any_item().get_item()->display_name() + ":\n"
3631  + colorize( denial, c_red );
3632  if( static_cast<size_t>( utf8_width( denial ) ) > highlighted_entry.cached_denial_space ) {
3633  popup( assembled, PF_GET_KEY );
3634  }
3635  }
3636  count = 0;
3637  return;
3638  }
3639 
3640  // Deal with anything else that can't be selected
3641  if( selected.empty() ) {
3642  count = 0;
3643  return;
3644  }
3645 
3646  // No amount entered, select all
3647  if( count == 0 ) {
3648  bool select_nonfav = true;
3649  bool select_fav = true;
3650  switch( mode ) {
3651  case toggle_mode::SELECTED: {
3652  count = INT_MAX;
3653 
3654  // Any non favorite item to select?
3655  select_nonfav = std::any_of( selected.begin(), selected.end(),
3656  []( const inventory_entry * elem ) {
3657  return ( !elem->any_item()->is_favorite ) && elem->chosen_count == 0;
3658  } );
3659 
3660  // Otherwise, any favorite item to select?
3661  select_fav = !select_nonfav && std::any_of( selected.begin(), selected.end(),
3662  []( const inventory_entry * elem ) {
3663  return elem->any_item()->is_favorite && elem->chosen_count == 0;
3664  } );
3665  break;
3666  }
3667  case toggle_mode::NON_FAVORITE_NON_WORN: {
3668  const bool clear = std::none_of( selected.begin(), selected.end(),
3669  []( const inventory_entry * elem ) {
3670  return elem->chosen_count > 0;
3671  } );
3672 
3673  if( clear ) {
3674  count = max_chosen_count;
3675  }
3676  break;
3677  }
3678  }
3679 
3680  for( inventory_entry *elem : selected ) {
3681  const bool is_favorite = elem->any_item()->is_favorite;
3682  if( ( select_nonfav && !is_favorite ) || ( select_fav && is_favorite ) ) {
3683  set_chosen_count( *elem, count );
3684  } else if( !select_nonfav && !select_fav ) {
3685  // Every element is selected, unselect all
3686  set_chosen_count( *elem, 0 );
3687  }
3688  }
3689  // Select the entered amount
3690  } else {
3691  for( inventory_entry *elem : selected ) {
3692  set_chosen_count( *elem, count );
3693  }
3694  }
3695 
3696  if( !allow_select_contained ) {
3697  deselect_contained_items();
3698  }
3699 
3700  selection_col->prepare_paging();
3701  count = 0;
3702  on_toggle();
3703 }

3705 drop_locations inventory_multiselector::execute( bool allow_empty )
3706 {
3707  shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> ui = create_or_get_ui_adaptor();
3708  debug_print_timer( tp_start );
3709  while( true ) {
3710  ui_manager::redraw();
3711 
3712  const inventory_input input = get_input();
3713 
3714  if( input.action == "CONFIRM" ) {
3715  if( to_use.empty() && !allow_empty ) {
3716  popup_getkey( _( "No items were selected. Use %s to select them." ),
3717  ctxt.get_desc( "TOGGLE_ENTRY" ) );
3718  continue;
3719  }
3720  break;
3721  }
3722 
3723  if( input.action == "QUIT" ) {
3724  return drop_locations();
3725  }
3726 
3727  on_input( input );
3728  }
3729  drop_locations dropped_pos_and_qty;
3730  for( const std::pair<item_location, int> &drop_pair : to_use ) {
3731  dropped_pos_and_qty.push_back( drop_pair );
3732  }
3733 
3734  return dropped_pos_and_qty;
3735 }

3740 std::pair<const item *, const item *> inventory_compare_selector::execute()
3741 {
3742  shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> ui = create_or_get_ui_adaptor();
3743  debug_print_timer( tp_start );
3744  while( true ) {
3745  ui_manager::redraw();
3746 
3747  const inventory_input input = get_input();
3748 
3749  inventory_entry *just_selected = nullptr;
3750 
3751  if( input.entry != nullptr ) {
3752  highlight( input.entry->any_item() );
3753  if( input.action == "SELECT" || input.action == "ANY_INPUT" ) {
3754  toggle_entry( input.entry );
3755  just_selected = input.entry;
3756  } else if( input.action != "MOUSE_MOVE" ) {
3757  inventory_selector::on_input( input );
3758  }
3759  } else if( input.action == "TOGGLE_ENTRY" ) {
3760  const auto selection( get_active_column().get_all_selected() );
3761 
3762  for( inventory_entry * const &elem : selection ) {
3763  if( elem->chosen_count == 0 || selection.size() == 1 ) {
3764  toggle_entry( elem );
3765  just_selected = elem;
3766  if( compared.size() == 2 ) {
3767  break;
3768  }
3769  }
3770  }
3771  } else if( input.action == "CONFIRM" ) {
3772  popup_getkey( _( "You need two items for comparison. Use %s to select them." ),
3773  ctxt.get_desc( "TOGGLE_ENTRY" ) );
3774  } else if( input.action == "QUIT" ) {
3775  return std::make_pair( nullptr, nullptr );
3776  } else if( input.action == "TOGGLE_FAVORITE" ) {
3777  // TODO: implement favoriting in multi selection menus while maintaining selection
3778  } else {
3779  inventory_selector::on_input( input );
3780  }
3781 
3782  if( compared.size() == 2 ) {
3783  const auto res = std::make_pair( compared[0], compared[1] );
3784  // Clear second selected entry to prevent comparison reopening too
3785  // soon
3786  if( just_selected ) {
3787  toggle_entry( just_selected );
3788  }
3789  return res;
3790  }
3791  }
3792 }

3794 void inventory_compare_selector::toggle_entry( inventory_entry *entry )
3795 {
3796  const item *it = &*entry->any_item();
3797  const auto iter = std::find( compared.begin(), compared.end(), it );
3798 
3799  entry->chosen_count = iter == compared.end() ? 1 : 0;
3800 
3801  if( entry->chosen_count != 0 ) {
3802  compared.push_back( it );
3803  } else {
3804  compared.erase( iter );
3805  }
3806 
3807  on_change( *entry );
3808 }

3843 void inventory_multiselector::deselect_contained_items()
3844 {
3845  std::vector<item_location> inventory_items;
3846  for( std::pair<item_location, int> &drop : to_use ) {
3847  item_location loc_front = drop.first;
3848  inventory_items.push_back( loc_front );
3849  }
3850  for( item_location loc_container : inventory_items ) {
3851  if( !loc_container->empty() ) {
3852  for( inventory_column *col : get_all_columns() ) {
3853  for( inventory_entry *selected : col->get_entries( []( const inventory_entry & entry ) {
3854  return entry.chosen_count > 0;
3855  } ) ) {
3856  if( !selected->is_item() ) {
3857  continue;
3858  }
3859  for( const item *item_contained : loc_container->all_items_ptr() ) {
3860  for( const item_location &selected_loc : selected->locations ) {
3861  if( selected_loc.get_item() == item_contained ) {
3862  set_chosen_count( *selected, 0 );
3863  }
3864  }
3865  }
3866  }
3867  }
3868  }
3869  }
3870  for( inventory_column *col : get_all_columns() ) {
3871  for( inventory_entry *selected : col->get_entries(
3872  []( const inventory_entry & entry ) {
3873  return entry.is_item() && entry.chosen_count > 0 && entry.locations.front()->is_frozen_liquid() &&
3874  //Frozen liquids can be selected if it have the SHREDDED flag.
3875  !entry.locations.front()->has_flag( STATIC( flag_id( "SHREDDED" ) ) ) &&
3876  (
3877  ( //Frozen liquids on the map are not selectable if they can't be crushed.
3878  entry.locations.front().where() == item_location::type::map &&
3879  !get_player_character().can_crush_frozen_liquid( entry.locations.front() ).success() ) ||
3880  ( //Weapon in hand is can selectable.
3881  entry.locations.front().where() == item_location::type::character &&
3882  !entry.locations.front().has_parent() &&
3883  entry.locations.front() != get_player_character().used_weapon() ) ||
3884  ( //Frozen liquids are unselectable if they don't have SHREDDED flag and can't be crushed in a container.
3885  entry.locations.front().has_parent() &&
3886  entry.locations.front().where() == item_location::type::container &&
3887  !get_player_character().can_crush_frozen_liquid( entry.locations.front() ).success() )
3888  );
3889  } ) ) {
3890  set_chosen_count( *selected, 0 );
3891  }
3892  }
3893 }
3894 
3895 void inventory_multiselector::toggle_categorize_contained()
3896 {
3897  selection_col->clear();
3898  inventory_selector::toggle_categorize_contained();
3899 
3900  for( inventory_column *col : get_all_columns() ) {
3901  for( inventory_entry *entry : col->get_entries( return_item, true ) ) {
3902  if( entry->chosen_count > 0 ) {
3903  toggle_entry( *entry, entry->chosen_count );
3904  }
3905  }
3906  }

3908 
3909 void inventory_multiselector::on_input( const inventory_input &input )
3910 {
3911  if( input.entry != nullptr ) { // Single Item from mouse
3912  highlight( input.entry->any_item() );
3913  if( input.action == "SELECT" || input.action == "ANY_INPUT" ) {
3914  toggle_entries( count );
3915  }
3916  }
3917  if( input.action == "TOGGLE_NON_FAVORITE" ) {
3918  toggle_entries( count, toggle_mode::NON_FAVORITE_NON_WORN );
3919  } else if( input.action == "MARK_WITH_COUNT" ) { // Set count and mark selected with specific key
3920  int query_result = query_count();
3921  if( query_result >= 0 ) {
3922  toggle_entries( query_result, toggle_mode::SELECTED );
3923  }
3924  } else if( !uistate.numpad_navigation && input.ch >= '0' && input.ch <= '9' ) {
3925  int query_result = query_count( input.ch, true );
3926  if( query_result >= 0 ) {
3927  toggle_entries( query_result, toggle_mode::SELECTED );
3928  }
3929  } else if( input.action == "TOGGLE_ENTRY" ) { // Mark selected
3930  toggle_entries( count, toggle_mode::SELECTED );
3931  } else if( input.action == "INCREASE_COUNT" || input.action == "DECREASE_COUNT" ) {
3932  inventory_entry &entry = get_active_column().get_highlighted();
3933  if( entry.is_selectable() ) {
3934  size_t const count = entry.chosen_count;
3935  size_t const max = entry.get_available_count();
3936  size_t const newcount = input.action == "INCREASE_COUNT"
3937  ? count < max ? count + 1 : max
3938  : count > 1 ? count - 1 : 0;
3939  toggle_entry( entry, newcount );
3940  }
3941  } else if( input.action == "VIEW_CATEGORY_MODE" ) {
3942  toggle_categorize_contained();
3943  } else {
3944  inventory_selector::on_input( input );
3945  }
3946 }

3953 void inventory_haul_selector::apply_selection( std::vector<item_location> &items )
3954 {
3955  // Finding an entry is cheap, changing it is expensive, so find everything first then modify once
3956  std::unordered_map<inventory_entry *, int> counts;
3957  for( item_location &item : items ) {
3958  inventory_entry *entry = find_entry_by_location( item );
3959  if( counts.count( entry ) ) {
3960  counts.at( entry ) += 1;
3961  } else {
3962  counts.emplace( entry, 1 );
3963  }
3964  }
3965  for( std::pair<inventory_entry *, int> count : counts ) {
3966  // count_by_charges items will be moved all at once anyway, this is just to make it look a bit better
3967  if( count.first->locations.size() == 1 && count.first->locations[0]->count_by_charges() ) {
3968  set_chosen_count( *count.first, inventory_multiselector::max_chosen_count );
3969  } else {
3970  set_chosen_count( *count.first, count.second );
3971  }
3972  }
3973 }

3991 
3992 drop_locations inventory_drop_selector::execute()
3993 {
3994  shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> ui = create_or_get_ui_adaptor();
3995  debug_print_timer( tp_start );
3996  while( true ) {
3997  ui_manager::redraw();
3998 
3999  const inventory_input input = get_input();
4000  if( input.action == "CONFIRM" ) {
4001  if( to_use.empty() ) {
4002  popup_getkey( _( "No items were selected. Use %s to select them." ),
4003  ctxt.get_desc( "TOGGLE_ENTRY" ) );
4004  continue;
4005  }
4006  break;
4007  }
4008 
4009  if( input.action == "QUIT" ) {
4010  return drop_locations();
4011  }
4012 
4013  on_input( input );
4014  }
4015 
4016  drop_locations dropped_pos_and_qty;
4017 
4018  enum class drop_liquid {
4019  ask, no, yes
4020  } should_drop_liquid = drop_liquid::ask;
4021 
4022  for( const std::pair<item_location, int> &drop_pair : to_use ) {
4023  bool should_drop = true;
4024  if( drop_pair.first->made_of_from_type( phase_id::LIQUID ) &&
4025  !drop_pair.first->is_frozen_liquid() ) {
4026  if( should_drop_liquid == drop_liquid::ask ) {
4027  if( !warn_liquid || query_yn(
4028  _( "You are dropping liquid from its container. You might not be able to pick it back up. Really do so?" ) ) ) {
4029  should_drop_liquid = drop_liquid::yes;
4030  } else {
4031  should_drop_liquid = drop_liquid::no;
4032  }
4033  }
4034  if( should_drop_liquid == drop_liquid::no ) {
4035  should_drop = false;
4036  }
4037  }
4038  if( should_drop ) {
4039  dropped_pos_and_qty.push_back( drop_pair );
4040  }
4041  }
4042 
4043  return dropped_pos_and_qty;
4044 }

4046 inventory_selector::stats inventory_drop_selector::get_raw_stats() const

4049  u.weight_carried_with_tweaks( to_use ),
4050  u.weight_capacity(),
4051  u.volume_carried_with_tweaks( to_use ),
4052  u.volume_capacity_with_tweaks( to_use ),
4053  u.max_single_item_length(), u.max_single_item_volume(),
4054  u.free_holster_volume(), u.used_holsters(), u.total_holsters() );

4056 
4057 inventory_selector::stats inventory_insert_selector::get_raw_stats() const
4058 {
4059  units::mass selected_weight = units::mass();
4060  units::volume selected_volume = units::volume();
4061  const item_location &holster = static_cast<const inventory_holster_preset &>
4062  ( preset ).get_holster();
4063  const std::vector<inventory_column *> &columns = get_all_columns();
4064  int holstered_items = 0;
4065  units::volume holster_volume = units::volume();
4066  units::mass holster_weight = units::mass();
4067  std::vector<const item_pocket *> used_pockets = std::vector<const item_pocket *>();
4068  for( const inventory_column *c : columns ) {
4069  if( c == nullptr ) {
4070  continue;
4071  }
4072  if( c->allows_selecting() ) {
4073  const inventory_column::get_entries_t entries = c->get_entries( always_yes );
4074  for( const inventory_entry *e : entries ) {
4075  if( e == nullptr ) {
4076  continue;
4077  }
4078  if( e->chosen_count == 0 ) {
4079  continue;
4080  }
4081  const item *item_to_insert = e->any_item().get_item();
4082  if( item_to_insert == nullptr ) {
4083  continue;
4084  }
4085  units::mass w = item_to_insert->weight();
4086  units::volume v = item_to_insert->volume();
4087  int overflow_counter = e->chosen_count;
4088  for( const item_pocket *p : holster.get_item()->get_all_contained_pockets() ) {
4089  bool pocket_already_used = false;
4090  for( const item_pocket *used_pocket : used_pockets ) {
4091  if( p == used_pocket ) {
4092  pocket_already_used = true;
4093  break;
4094  }
4095  }
4096  if( !pocket_already_used && p->is_holster() && !p->holster_full() ) {
4097  ret_val<item_pocket::contain_code> contain = p->can_contain( *item_to_insert );
4098  if( contain.success() ) {
4099  bool has_better_pocket = false;
4100  for( const item_pocket *other_pocket : holster.get_item()->get_all_contained_pockets() ) {
4101  if( p == other_pocket ) {
4102  continue;
4103  }
4104  if( p->better_pocket( *other_pocket, *item_to_insert, false ) ) {
4105  has_better_pocket = true;
4106  }
4107  }
4108  if( has_better_pocket ) {
4109  continue;
4110  }
4111  holstered_items += 1;
4112  holster_weight += w;
4113  holster_volume += v;
4114  used_pockets.push_back( p );
4115  overflow_counter -= 1;
4116  if( overflow_counter <= 0 ) {
4117  break;
4118  }
4119  }
4120  }
4121  }
4122  selected_weight += w * overflow_counter;
4123  selected_volume += v * overflow_counter;
4124  }
4125  }
4126  }
4127 
4128  units::mass contained_weight = holster->get_total_contained_weight() + selected_weight +
4129  holster_weight +
4130  holster->get_used_holster_weight();
4131  units::mass total_weight = holster->get_total_weight_capacity() + holster_weight;
4132  units::volume contained_volume = holster->get_total_contained_volume() + selected_volume +
4133  holster_volume;
4134  units::volume total_volume = holster->get_total_capacity();
4135  return get_weight_and_volume_and_holster_stats( contained_weight,
4136  total_weight,
4137  contained_volume,
4138  total_volume,
4139  holster->max_containable_length(),
4140  holster->max_containable_volume(),
4141  holster->get_total_holster_volume() - ( holster->get_used_holster_volume() + holster_volume ),
4142  holster->get_used_holsters() + holstered_items,
4143  holster->get_total_holsters() );
4144 }

4180 drop_locations pickup_selector::execute()

4202  if( wear() ) {
4203  return drop_locations();
4204  }

4206  return drop_locations();

4208  on_input( input );
4209  }
4210  }

4213  dropped_pos_and_qty.push_back( drop_pair );
4214  }
4215

4219 bool pickup_selector::wield( int &count )
4220 {
4221  inventory_entry &selected = get_active_column().get_highlighted();
4222  if( !selected.is_item() ) {
4223  return false;
4224  }
4225 
4226  item_location it = selected.any_item();
4227  if( count == 0 ) {
4228  count = INT_MAX;
4229  }
4230  int charges = std::min( it->charges, count );
4231 
4232  if( u.can_wield( *it ).success() ) {
4233  remove_from_to_use( it );
4234  add_reopen_activity();
4235  u.assign_activity( wield_activity_actor( it, charges ) );
4236  return true;
4237  } else {
4238  popup_getkey( u.can_wield( *it ).c_str() );
4239  }
4240 
4241  return false;
4242 }

4292 inventory_selector::stats pickup_selector::get_raw_stats() const
4293 {
4294  units::mass weight;
4295  units::volume volume;
4296 
4297  for( const drop_location &loc : to_use ) {

4302  volume += copy.volume();

4305  volume += loc.first->volume() * loc.second;
4306  }
4307  }
4308 
4309  return get_weight_and_volume_and_holster_stats(
4310  u.weight_carried() + weight,
4311  u.weight_capacity(),
4312  u.volume_carried() + volume,
4313  u.volume_capacity(),
4314  u.max_single_item_length(),
4315  u.max_single_item_volume(),

4355 int inventory_examiner::execute()
4356 {
4357  if( !check_parent_item() ) {
4358  return NO_CONTENTS_TO_EXAMINE;
4359  }
4360  shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> ui = create_or_get_ui_adaptor();
4361  debug_print_timer( tp_start );
4362 
4363  ui_adaptor ui_examine;
4364 
4365  ui_examine.on_screen_resize( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui_examine ) {
4366  force_max_window_size();
4367  ui->mark_resize();
4368 
4369  int const width = TERMX - _fixed_size.x;
4370  int const height = TERMY;
4371  point const start_position = point( TERMX - width, 0 );
4372 
4373  scroll_item_info_lines = TERMY / 2;
4374 
4375  w_examine = catacurses::newwin( height, width, start_position );
4376  ui_examine.position_from_window( w_examine );
4377  } );
4378  ui_examine.mark_resize();
4379 
4380  ui_examine.on_redraw( [&]( const ui_adaptor & ) {
4381  const inventory_entry &selected = get_active_column().get_highlighted();
4382  if( selected ) {
4383  if( selected_item != selected.any_item() ) {
4384  //A new item has been selected, reset scrolling
4385  examine_window_scroll = 0;
4386  selected_item = selected.any_item();
4387  }
4388  draw_item_details( selected_item );
4389  }
4390  } );
4391 
4392  while( true ) {
4393  /* Since ui_examine is the most recently created ui_adaptor, it will always be redrawn.
4394  The item list will only be redrawn when specifically invalidated */
4395  ui_manager::redraw();
4396 
4397  const inventory_input input = get_input();
4398 
4399  if( input.entry != nullptr ) {
4400  if( highlight( input.entry->any_item() ) ) {
4401  ui_manager::redraw();
4402  }
4403  if( input.action == "SELECT" ) {
4404  return cleanup();
4405  }
4406  }
4407 
4408  if( input.action == "QUIT" || input.action == "CONFIRM" ) {
4409  return cleanup();
4410  } else if( input.action == "PAGE_UP" || input.action == "SCROLL_UP" ) {
4411  examine_window_scroll -= scroll_item_info_lines;
4412  } else if( input.action == "PAGE_DOWN" || input.action == "SCROLL_DOWN" ) {
4413  examine_window_scroll += scroll_item_info_lines;
4414  } else {
4415  ui->invalidate_ui(); //The player is probably doing something that requires updating the base window
4416  if( input.action == "SHOW_HIDE_CONTENTS" ) {
4417  changes_made = true;
4418  }
4419  on_input( input );
4420  }
4421  }
4422 }

4448 std::pair<item_location, bool> unload_selector::execute()
4449 {
4450  shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> ui = create_or_get_ui_adaptor();
4451  item_location startDragItem;
4452  bool dragActive = false;
4453  while( true ) {
4454  ui_manager::redraw();
4455  const inventory_input input = get_input();
4456  if( input.entry != nullptr ) {
4457  if( drag_enabled && input.action == "CLICK_AND_DRAG" ) {
4458  if( input.entry->is_item() ) {
4459  dragActive = true;
4460  startDragItem = input.entry->locations.front();
4461  }
4462  } else if( input.action == "MOUSE_MOVE" ) {
4463  if( !dragActive && highlight( input.entry->any_item() ) ) {
4464  ui_manager::redraw();
4465  }
4466  } else if( input.action == "SELECT" ) {
4467  dragActive = false;
4468  item_location startDragItemCpy = startDragItem;
4469  startDragItem = item_location();
4470  item_location endDragItem;
4471  if( input.entry->is_item() ) {
4472  endDragItem = input.entry->locations.front();
4473  if( startDragItemCpy && endDragItem && startDragItemCpy != endDragItem ) {
4474  if( drag_drop_item( startDragItemCpy.get_item(), endDragItem.get_item() ) ) {
4475  clear_items();
4476  add_character_items( u );
4477  }
4478  } else {
4479  return {input.entry->any_item(), uistate.unload_auto_contain};
4480  }
4481  }
4482  } else if( input.action == "ANY_INPUT" ) {
4483  return {input.entry->any_item(), uistate.unload_auto_contain};
4484  } else {
4485  if( !dragActive && highlight( input.entry->any_item() ) ) {
4486  ui_manager::redraw();
4487  }
4488  on_input( input );
4489  }
4490  } else if( input.action == "QUIT" ) {
4491  return { item_location(), uistate.unload_auto_contain };
4492  } else if( input.action == "CONFIRM" ) {
4493  const inventory_entry &highlighted = get_active_column().get_highlighted();
4494  if( highlighted && highlighted.is_selectable() ) {
4495  return { highlighted.any_item(), uistate.unload_auto_contain };
4496  }
4497  } else if( input.action == "CONTAIN_MODE" ) {
4498  uistate.unload_auto_contain = !uistate.unload_auto_contain;
4499  set_hint( hint_string() );
4500  } else {
4501  on_input( input );
4502  }
4503  }
4504 }

4533 void trade_selector::execute()
4534 {

4536  bool exit = false;
4537 
4538  get_active_column().on_activate();
4539 
4540  while( !exit ) {
4541  _ui->invalidate_ui();
4542  ui_manager::redraw_invalidated();
4543  std::string const &action = _ctxt_trade.handle_input();
4544  if( action == ACTION_SWITCH_PANES ) {
4545  _parent->pushevent( trade_ui::event::SWITCH );
4546  get_active_column().on_deactivate();
4547  exit = true;
4548  } else if( action == ACTION_TRADE_OK ) {
4549  _parent->pushevent( trade_ui::event::TRADEOK );
4550  exit = true;
4551  } else if( action == ACTION_TRADE_CANCEL ) {
4552  _parent->pushevent( trade_ui::event::TRADECANCEL );
4553  exit = true;
4554  } else if( action == ACTION_AUTOBALANCE ) {
4555  _parent->autobalance();
4556  } else if( action == ACTION_BANKBALANCE ) {
4557  _parent->bank_balance();
4558  } else {
4559  input_event const iev = _ctxt_trade.get_raw_input();
4560  inventory_input const input =
4561  process_input( ctxt.input_to_action( iev ), iev.get_first_input() );
4562  inventory_drop_selector::on_input( input );
4563  if( input.action == "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" ) {
4564  ctxt.display_menu();
4565  }
4566  }
4567  }
